h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V0.0069^ea^ ^a^M0.0077^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ ^a^T0.0073^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire bodhirukkhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii {vimuttisukha.m pa.tisa.mvedii (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}. atha kho bhagavaa tassa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m anuloma.m saadhuka.m manasaakaasi --

[03] ``iti imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ida.m uppajjati, yadida.m -- avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa ^a^V0.0070^ea^ bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yadaa ^a^M0.0078^ea^ ^a^T0.0074^ea^ have paatubhavanti dhammaa,
[27] aataapino jhaayato braahma.nassa.
[26] athassa ka"nkhaa vapayanti sabbaa,
[22] yato pajaanaati sahetudhamma''nti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P0.0002^ea^ me suta.m -- eka samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire bodhirukkhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii. atha kho bhagavaa tassa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m pa.tiloma.m saadhuka.m manasaakaasi --

[03] ``iti imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati, yadida.m -- avijjaanirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yadaa have paatubhavanti dhammaa,
[27] aataapino ^a^T0.0075^ea^ jhaayato braahma.nassa.
[26] athassa ka"nkhaa vapayanti sabbaa,
[22] yato khaya.m paccayaana.m avedii''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V0.0071^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire bodhirukkhamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tena kho pana samayena ^a^M0.0079^ea^ bhagavaa sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii. atha kho bhagavaa tassa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m pa.ticcasamuppaada.m anulomapa.tiloma.m saadhuka.m manasaakaasi --

[03] ``iti imasmi.m sati ida.m hoti, imassuppaadaa ida.m uppajjati, imasmi.m asati ida.m na hoti, imassa nirodhaa ida.m nirujjhati; yadida.m -- avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

[03] ``avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa naamaruupanirodho, naamaruupanirodhaa sa.laayatananirodho, sa.laayatananirodhaa phassanirodho, phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho, vedanaanirodhaa ta.nhaanirodho ^a^T0.0076^ea^, ta.nhaanirodhaa upaadaananirodho, upaadaananirodhaa bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhaa jaatinirodho, jaatinirodhaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa nirujjhanti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho ^a^P0.0003^ea^ hotii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yadaa have paatubhavanti dhammaa,
[27] aataapino jhaayato braahma.nassa.
[26] vidhuupaya.m ti.t.thati maarasena.m,
[22] suuriyova {suriyova (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} obhaasayamantalikkha''nti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0080^ea^ ^a^V0.0072^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii. atha kho bhagavaa tassa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thaasi.

[03] atha kho a~n~nataro hu.mhu"nkajaatiko {huhu"nkajaatiko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho so braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bho gotama, braahma.no hoti, katame ca pana braahma.nakara.naa {braahma.nakaarakaa (ka0)} dhammaa''ti?
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa ^a^T0.0077^ea^ taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yo braahma.no baahitapaapadhammo,
[27] nihu.mhu"nko {nihuhu"nko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m pii0)} nikkasaavo yatatto.
[26] vedantaguu vuusitabrahmacariyo,
[27] dhammena so brahmavaada.m vadeyya.
[22] yassussadaa natthi kuhi~nci loke''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano aayasmaa ca mahaakassapo aayasmaa ca mahaakaccaano {mahaakaccaayano (sii0 pii0 ka0)} aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko aayasmaa ca mahaakappino aayasmaa ca mahaacundo aayasmaa ca anuruddho aayasmaa ca revato aayasmaa ca nando {aanando (sii0 pii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^P0.0004^ea^.

[03] addasaa ^a^M0.0081^ea^ kho bhagavaa te aayasmante duuratova aagacchante; disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ete, bhikkhave, braahma.naa aagacchanti; ete, bhikkhave, braahma.naa aagacchantii''ti. eva.m vutte ^a^V0.0073^ea^, a~n~nataro braahma.najaatiko bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, braahma.no hoti, katame ca pana braahma.nakara.naa dhammaa''ti?
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``baahitvaa paapake dhamme, ye caranti sadaa sataa.
[22] khii.nasa.myojanaa ^a^T0.0078^ea^ buddhaa, te ve {teva (sii0)} lokasmi braahma.naa''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaakassapo pippaliguhaaya.m {pipphaliguhaaya.m (syaa0), simbaliguhaaya.m (ka0)} viharati aabaadhiko {aabaadhiko hoti (syaa0 pii0)} dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aparena samayena tamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thaasi. atha kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa tamhaa aabaadhaa vu.t.thitassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paviseyya''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaani devataasataani ussukka.m aapannaani honti aayasmato mahaakassapassa pi.n.dapaatapa.tilaabhaaya. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo taani pa~ncamattaani devataasataani pa.tikkhipitvaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi -- yena daliddavisikhaa kapa.navisikhaa pesakaaravisikhaa. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m raajagahe pi.n.daaya caranta.m yena daliddavisikhaa kapa.navisikhaa pesakaaravisikhaa.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``ana~n~naposima~n~naata.m, danta.m saare pati.t.thita.m.
[22] khii.naasava.m vantadosa.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0082^ea^ ^a^V0.0074^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa paavaaya.m {paa.taliya.m (pii0)} viharati ajakalaapake ^a^T0.0079^ea^ cetiye, ajakalaapakassa yakkhassa bhavane. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa rattandhakaaratimisaaya.m ^a^P0.0005^ea^ abbhokaase nisinno hoti; devo ca ekameka.m phusaayati. atha kho ajakalaapako yakkho bhagavato bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.msa.m uppaadetukaamo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato aviduure tikkhattu.m ``akkulo pakkulo''ti akkulapakkulika.m akaasi -- ``eso te, sama.na, pisaaco''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yadaa sakesu dhammesu, paaraguu hoti braahma.no.
[22] atha eta.m pisaaca~nca, pakkula~ncaativattatii''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa sa"ngaamaji saavatthi.m anuppatto hoti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. assosi kho aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa puraa.nadutiyikaa -- ``ayyo kira sa"ngaamaji saavatthi.m anuppatto''ti. saa daaraka.m aadaaya jetavana.m agamaasi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa sa"ngaamaji a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule divaavihaara.m nisinno hoti. atha kho aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa puraa.nadutiyikaa yenaayasmaa sa"ngaamaji tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m sa"ngaamaji.m etadavoca -- ``khuddaputta~nhi {khuddaputtaamhi (sii0)}, sama.na, posa ma''nti. eva.m vutte, aayasmaa sa"ngaamaji tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] dutiyampi kho aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa puraa.nadutiyikaa aayasmanta.m ^a^T0.0080^ea^ sa"ngaamaji.m etadavoca -- ``khuddaputta~nhi, sama.na, posa ma''nti. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa sa"ngaamaji tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] tatiyampi ^a^M0.0083^ea^ ^a^V0.0075^ea^ kho aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa puraa.nadutiyikaa aayasmanta.m sa"ngaamaji.m etadavoca -- ``khuddaputta~nhi, sama.na, posa ma''nti. tatiyampi kho aayasmaa sa"ngaamaji tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa puraa.nadutiyikaa ta.m daaraka.m aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa purato nikkhipitvaa pakkaami {pakkami (ka0) evamuparipi} -- ``eso {esa (sii0 ka0)} te, sama.na, putto; posa na''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa sa"ngaamaji ta.m daaraka.m neva olokesi naapi aalapi. atha kho aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa puraa.nadutiyikaa ^a^P0.0006^ea^ aviduura.m {aviduure (syaa0 pii0)} gantvaa apalokentii addasa aayasmanta.m sa"ngaamaji.m ta.m daaraka.m neva olokenta.m naapi aalapanta.m, disvaanassaa etadahosi -- ``na caaya.m sama.no puttenapi atthiko''ti. tato pa.tinivattitvaa daaraka.m aadaaya pakkaami. addasaa kho bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena aayasmato sa"ngaamajissa puraa.nadutiyikaaya evaruupa.m vippakaara.m.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``aayanti.m naabhinandati, pakkamanti.m na socati.
[22] sa"ngaa sa"ngaamaji.m mutta.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na''nti.. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa gayaaya.m viharati gayaasiise. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa ja.tilaa siitaasu hemantikaasu ^a^T0.0081^ea^ rattiisu antara.t.thake himapaatasamaye gayaaya.m ummujjantipi nimujjantipi, ummujjanimujjampi karonti osi~ncantipi, aggimpi juhanti -- ``iminaa suddhii''ti.

[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa te sambahule ja.tile siitaasu hemantikaasu rattiisu antara.t.thake himapaatasamaye gayaaya.m ummujjantepi nimujjantepi ummujjanimujjampi karonte {ummujjanimujja.m karontepi (sii0 pii0 ka0)} osi~ncantepi aggimpi juhante -- ``iminaa suddhii''ti.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0084^ea^ ^a^V0.0076^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``na udakena sucii hotii, bahvettha nhaayatii {nahaayatii (sii0)} jano.
[22] yamhi sacca~nca dhammo ca, so sucii so ca braahma.no''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena baahiyo daaruciiriyo suppaarake pa.tivasati samuddatiire sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. atha kho baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``ye kho keci loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa, aha.m tesa.m a~n~nataro''ti.

[03] atha kho ^a^P0.0007^ea^ baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa puraa.nasaalohitaa devataa anukampikaa atthakaamaa baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya yena baahiyo daaruciiriyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa baahiya.m daaruciiriya.m etadavoca -- ``neva kho tva.m ^a^T0.0082^ea^, baahiya, arahaa, naapi arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno. saapi te pa.tipadaa natthi yaaya tva.m arahaa vaa assa {assasi (syaa0 ka0)} arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno''ti.

[03] ``atha ke carahi sadevake loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapanno''ti? ``atthi, baahiya, uttaresu janapadesu {janapade (sii0)} saavatthi naama nagara.m. tattha so bhagavaa etarahi viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho. so hi, baahiya, bhagavaa arahaa ceva arahattaaya ca dhamma.m desetii''ti.

[03] atha kho baahiyo daaruciiriyo taaya devataaya sa.mvejito taavadeva suppaarakamhaa pakkaami. sabbattha ekarattiparivaasena yena saavatthi jetavana.m anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena ^a^M0.0085^ea^ sambahulaa bhikkhuu abbhokaase ca"nkamanti. atha kho baahiyo daaruciiriyo yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bhante, etarahi bhagavaa viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho? dassanakaamamhaa maya.m ta.m ^a^V0.0077^ea^ bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. ``antaraghara.m pavi.t.tho kho, baahiya, bhagavaa pi.n.daayaa''ti.

[03] atha kho baahiyo daaruciiriyo taramaanaruupo jetavanaa nikkhamitvaa saavatthi.m pavisitvaa addasa bhagavanta.m saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caranta.m paasaadika.m pasaadaniiya.m santindriya.m santamaanasa.m ^a^T0.0083^ea^ uttamadamathasamathamanuppatta.m danta.m gutta.m yatindriya.m naaga.m. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paade sirasaa nipatitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``desetu me, bhante bhagavaa, dhamma.m; desetu, sugato, dhamma.m, ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa baahiya.m daaruciiriya.m etadavoca -- ``akaalo kho taava, baahiya, antaraghara.m pavi.t.thamhaa pi.n.daayaa''ti.

[03] dutiyampi kho baahiyo daaruciiriyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dujjaana.m kho paneta.m, bhante, bhagavato vaa jiivitantaraayaana.m, mayha.m vaa jiivitantaraayaana.m ^a^P0.0008^ea^. desetu me, bhante bhagavaa, dhamma.m; desetu, sugato, dhamma.m, ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa baahiya.m daaruciiriya.m etadavoca -- ``akaalo kho taava, baahiya, antaraghara.m pavi.t.thamhaa pi.n.daayaa''ti.

[03] tatiyampi kho baahiyo daaruciiriyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dujjaana.m kho paneta.m, bhante, bhagavato vaa jiivitantaraayaana.m, mayha.m vaa jiivitantaraayaana.m. desetu me bhante bhagavaa, dhamma.m; desetu, sugato, dhamma.m, ya.m mamassa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``tasmaatiha te, baahiya, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissati, sute sutamatta.m bhavissati, mute mutamatta.m bhavissati, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatamatta.m bhavissatii'ti. eva~nhi te, baahiya, sikkhitabba.m. yato kho te, baahiya, di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissati, sute sutamatta.m bhavissati, mute ^a^T0.0084^ea^ mutamatta.m bhavissati, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatamatta.m bhavissati, tato tva.m, baahiya, na tena; yato tva.m, baahiya, na tena tato tva.m, baahiya, na tattha ^a^M0.0086^ea^; yato tva.m, baahiya, na tattha, tato tva.m, baahiya, nevidha na hura.m na ubhayamantarena. esevanto dukkhassaa''ti.
[03] atha kho baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa bhagavato imaaya sa.mkhittaaya dhammadesanaaya taavadeva anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0078^ea^ kho bhagavaa baahiya.m daaruciiriya.m iminaa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovaditvaa pakkaami. atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato baahiya.m daaruciiriya.m gaavii taru.navacchaa adhipatitvaa {adhipaatetvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0), adhipaatitvaa (ka0)} jiivitaa voropesi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto sambahulehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m nagaramhaa nikkhamitvaa addasa baahiya.m daaruciiriya.m kaala"nkata.m {kaalakata.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}; disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ga.nhatha, bhikkhave, baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa sariiraka.m; ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa niiharitvaa jhaapetha; thuupa~ncassa karotha. sabrahmacaarii vo, bhikkhave, kaala"nkato''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa sariiraka.m ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa niiharitvaa jhaapetvaa thuupa~ncassa katvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``da.d.dha.m, bhante, baahiyassa daaruciiriyassa sariira.m, thuupo cassa ^a^T0.0085^ea^ kato. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, baahiyo daaruciiriyo paccapaadi dhammassaanudhamma.m; na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m ^a^P0.0009^ea^ vihesesi. parinibbuto, bhikkhave, baahiyo daaruciiriyo''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yattha aapo ca pathavii, tejo vaayo na gaadhati.
[27] na tattha sukkaa jotanti, aadicco nappakaasati.
[22] na tattha candimaa bhaati, tamo tattha na vijjati..
[21] ``yadaa ^a^M0.0087^ea^ ca attanaavedi {vedhii (ka0)}, muni monena braahma.no.
[22] atha ruupaa aruupaa ca, sukhadukkhaa pamuccatii''ti.. dasama.m.
[03] (ayampi udaano vutto bhagavataa iti me sutanti.) {( ) syaamapotthake natthi}
[06] bodhivaggo pa.thamo ni.t.thito.
[01] tassuddaana.m ^a^V0.0079^ea^ --
[21] tayo bodhi ca hu.mhu"nko {tayo ca bodhi nigrodho (sabbattha)}, braahma.no {te theraa (sii0 syaa0 pii0), thero (ka0)} kassapena ca.
[22] aja {paavaaya (sii0 syaa0), paa.taliya.m (pii0), paavaa (ka0)} sa"ngaama ja.tilaa, baahiyenaati te dasaati..

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P0.0010^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uruvelaaya.m viharati najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire mucalindamuule pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapa.tisa.mvedii.

[03] tena kho pana samayena mahaa akaalamegho udapaadi ^a^T0.0086^ea^ sattaahavaddalikaa siitavaataduddinii. atha kho mucalindo naagaraajaa sakabhavanaa nikkhamitvaa bhagavato kaaya.m sattakkhattu.m bhogehi parikkhipitvaa uparimuddhani mahanta.m pha.na.m vihacca a.t.thaasi -- ``maa bhagavanta.m siita.m, maa bhagavanta.m u.nha.m, maa bhagavanta.m .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapa {siri.msapa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} samphasso''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tassa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thaasi. atha kho mucalindo naagaraajaa viddha.m vigatavalaahaka.m deva.m viditvaa bhagavato kaayaa bhoge vinive.thetvaa sakava.n.na.m pa.tisa.mharitvaa maa.navakava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa bhagavato purato a.t.thaasi pa~njaliko bhagavanta.m namassamaano.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0088^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sukho viveko tu.t.thassa, sutadhammassa passato.
[22] abyaapajja.m sukha.m loke, paa.nabhuutesu sa.myamo..
[21] ``sukhaa ^a^V0.0080^ea^ viraagataa loke, kaamaana.m samatikkamo.
[22] asmimaanassa yo vinayo, eta.m ve parama.m sukha''nti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m ^a^P0.0011^ea^ upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``ko nu kho, aavuso, imesa.m dvinna.m raajuuna.m mahaddhanataro vaa mahaabhogataro vaa mahaakosataro vaa mahaavijitataro vaa mahaavaahanataro vaa ^a^T0.0087^ea^ mahabbalataro vaa mahiddhikataro vaa mahaanubhaavataro vaa raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro, raajaa vaa pasenadi kosalo''ti? aya~ncarahi tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m antaraakathaa hoti vippakataa.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenupa.t.thaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``kaaya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa sannipatitaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti?

[03] ``idha, bhante, amhaaka.m pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaana.m upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `ko nu kho, aavuso, imesa.m dvinna.m raajuuna.m mahaddhanataro vaa mahaabhogataro vaa mahaakosataro vaa mahaavijitataro vaa mahaavaahanataro vaa mahabbalataro vaa mahiddhikataro vaa mahaanubhaavataro vaa raajaa vaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro, raajaa vaa pasenadi kosalo'ti? aya.m kho no, bhante, antaraakathaa vippakataa, atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti.

[03] ``na ^a^M0.0089^ea^ khveta.m, bhikkhave, tumhaaka.m patiruupa.m kulaputtaana.m saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaana.m ya.m tumhe evaruupi.m katha.m katheyyaatha. sannipatitaana.m vo, bhikkhave, dvaya.m kara.niiya.m -- dhammii vaa kathaa ariyo vaa tu.nhiibhaavo''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``ya~nca ^a^V0.0081^ea^ kaamasukha.m loke, ya~ncida.m diviya.m sukha.m.
[22] ta.nhakkhayasukhassete ^a^T0.0088^ea^, kala.m naagghanti so.lasi''nti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa kumaarakaa antaraa ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca jetavana.m ahi.m da.n.dena hananti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho bhagavaa sambahule kumaarake antaraa ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca jetavana.m ahi.m da.n.dena hanante ^a^P0.0012^ea^.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sukhakaamaani bhuutaani, yo da.n.dena vihi.msati.
[22] attano sukhamesaano, pecca so na labhate sukha.m..
[21] ``sukhakaamaani bhuutaani, yo da.n.dena na hi.msati.
[22] attano sukhamesaano, pecca so labhate sukha''nti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa sakkato hoti garukato maanito puujito apacito, laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. bhikkhusa"nghopi sakkato hoti ^a^M0.0090^ea^ garukato maanito puujito apacito, laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. a~n~natitthiyaa pana paribbaajakaa asakkataa honti agarukataa amaanitaa {na apacitaa (syaa0 pii0)} apuujitaa ^a^T0.0089^ea^ anapacitaa, na laabhino ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. atha kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa bhagavato sakkaara.m asahamaanaa bhikkhusa"nghassa ca gaame ca ara~n~ne ca bhikkhuu disvaa asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosanti paribhaasanti rosenti vihesenti.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0082^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``etarahi, bhante, bhagavaa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito, laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. bhikkhusa"nghopi sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito, laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. a~n~natitthiyaa pana paribbaajakaa asakkataa agarukataa amaanitaa apuujitaa anapacitaa, na laabhino ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. atha kho te, bhante, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa bhagavato sakkaara.m asahamaanaa bhikkhusa"nghassa ca gaame ca ara~n~ne ca bhikkhuu disvaa asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosanti paribhaasanti rosenti vihesantii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``gaame ara~n~ne sukhadukkhaphu.t.tho,
[27] nevattato no parato dahetha.
[26] phusanti ^a^T0.0090^ea^ phassaa upadhi.m pa.ticca,
[22] niruupadhi.m kena phuseyyu phassaa''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P0.0013^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro icchaana"ngalako ^a^M0.0091^ea^ upaasako saavatthi.m anuppatto hoti kenacideva kara.niiyena. atha kho so upaasako saavatthiya.m ta.m kara.niiya.m tiiretvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m upaasaka.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``cirassa.m kho tva.m, upaasaka, ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaayaa''ti.
[03] ``cirapa.tikaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitukaamo, api caaha.m kehici kehici kiccakara.niiyehi byaava.to. evaaha.m naasakkhi.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.
[03] atha ^a^V0.0083^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sukha.m vata tassa na hoti ki~nci,
[27] sa"nkhaatadhammassa bahussutassa.
[26] saki~ncana.m passa viha~n~namaana.m,
[22] jano janasmi.m pa.tibandharuupo''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa paribbaajakassa daharamaa.navikaa pajaapati hoti gabbhinii ^a^T0.0091^ea^ upavija~n~naa. atha kho saa paribbaajikaa ta.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, tela.m aahara, ya.m me vijaataaya bhavissatii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, so paribbaajako ta.m paribbaajika.m etadavoca -- ``kuto panaaha.m, bhoti {bhotiyaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}, tela.m aaharaamii''ti? dutiyampi kho saa paribbaajikaa ta.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, tela.m aahara, ya.m me vijaataaya bhavissatii''ti. dutiyampi kho so paribbaajiko ta.m paribbaajika.m etadavoca -- ``kuto panaaha.m, bhoti, tela.m aaharaamii''ti? tatiyampi kho saa paribbaajikaa ta.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``gaccha tva.m, braahma.na, tela.m aahara, ya.m me vijaataaya bhavissatii''ti.

[03] tena ^a^M0.0092^ea^ kho pana samayena ra~n~no ^a^P0.0014^ea^ pasenadissa kosalassa ko.t.thaagaare sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa sappissa vaa telassa vaa yaavadattha.m paatu.m diiyati {diyyati (sii0 ka0)}, no niiharitu.m.

[03] atha kho tassa paribbaajakassa etadahosi -- ``ra~n~no kho pana pasenadissa kosalassa ko.t.thaagaare sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa sappissa vaa telassa vaa yaavadattha.m paatu.m diiyati, no niiharitu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa ko.t.thaagaara.m gantvaa telassa yaavadattha.m pivitvaa ghara.m aagantvaa ucchadditvaana {uggiritvaana (sii0 syaa0 pii0), ucchaditvaa (sii0 syaa0 a.t.tha0), uccha.d.ditvaana (ka0)} dadeyya.m, ya.m imissaa vijaataaya bhavissatii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0084^ea^ kho so paribbaajako ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa ko.t.thaagaara.m gantvaa telassa yaavadattha.m pivitvaa ghara.m aagantvaa neva ^a^T0.0092^ea^ sakkoti uddha.m kaatu.m, na pana adho. so dukkhaahi tibbaahi {tippaahi (syaa0)} kharaahi ka.tukaahi vedanaahi phu.t.tho aava.t.tati pariva.t.tati.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho bhagavaa ta.m paribbaajaka.m dukkhaahi tibbaahi kharaahi ka.tukaahi vedanaahi phu.t.tha.m aava.t.tamaana.m pariva.t.tamaana.m.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sukhino vata ye aki~ncanaa,
[27] vedaguno hi janaa aki~ncanaa.
[26] saki~ncana.m passa viha~n~namaana.m,
[22] jano janasmi.m pa.tibandhacitto'' {pa.tibaddhacitto (syaa0), pa.tibandharupo (?)} ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarassa upaasakassa ekaputtako piyo manaapo kaala"nkato hoti.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0093^ea^ kho sambahulaa upaasakaa allavatthaa allakesaa divaa divassa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te upaasake bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho tumhe, upaasakaa, allavatthaa allakesaa idhuupasa"nkamantaa divaa divassaa''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte, so upaasako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``mayha.m kho, bhante, ekaputtako piyo manaapo ^a^T0.0093^ea^ kaala"nkato. tena maya.m allavatthaa allakesaa idhuupasa"nkamantaa divaa divassaa''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``piyaruupassaadagadhitaase ^a^V0.0085^ea^ ^a^P0.0015^ea^ {piyaruupassaatagadhitaase (sii0 pii0)},
[27] devakaayaa puthu manussaa ca.
[26] aghaavino parijunnaa,
[22] maccuraajassa vasa.m gacchanti..
[21] ``ye ve divaa ca ratto ca,
[27] appamattaa jahanti piyaruupa.m.
[26] te ve kha.nanti aghamuula.m,
[22] maccuno aamisa.m durativatta''nti.. sattama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa ku.n.dikaaya.m {ku.n.diyaaya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} viharati ku.n.dadhaanavane {ku.n.di.t.thaanavane (syaa0 pii0)}. tena kho pana samayena suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa satta vassaani gabbha.m dhaareti. sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhaa saa dukkhaahi tibbaahi kharaahi ka.tukaahi vedanaahi phu.t.thaa tiihi vitakkehi adhivaaseti -- ``sammaasambuddho vata so bhagavaa yo imassa evaruupassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti; suppa.tipanno vata tassa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho yo imassa evaruupassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya pa.tipanno; susukha.m vata ta.m nibbaana.m yatthida.m evaruupa.m dukkha.m na sa.mvijjatii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0094^ea^ ^a^T0.0094^ea^ kho suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa saamika.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ayyaputta, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi; appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `suppavaasaa, bhante, koliyadhiitaa bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati; appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `suppavaasaa, bhante, koliyadhiitaa satta vassaani gabbha.m dhaareti. sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhaa saa dukkhaahi tibbaahi kharaahi ka.tukaahi vedanaahi phu.t.thaa tiihi vitakkehi adhivaaseti -- sammaasambuddho vata so bhagavaa yo imassa evaruupassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti; suppa.tipanno vata tassa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho yo imassa evaruupassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya pa.tipanno; susukha.m vata ta.m nibbaana.m yatthida.m evaruupa.m dukkha.m na sa.mvijjatii'''ti.

[03] ``parama''nti kho so koliyaputto suppavaasaaya koliyadhiitaaya pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^V0.0086^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho koliyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suppavaasaa, bhante, koliyadhiitaa bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati; eva~nca vadeti -- `suppavaasaa, bhante, koliyadhiitaa satta vassaani gabbha.m dhaareti. sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhaa ^a^P0.0016^ea^ saa dukkhaahi tibbaahi kharaahi ka.tukaahi vedanaahi phu.t.thaa tiihi vitakkehi adhivaaseti -- sammaasambuddho vata so bhagavaa yo ^a^T0.0095^ea^ imassa evaruupassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m deseti; suppa.tipanno vata tassa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho yo imassa evaruupassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya pa.tipanno; susukha.m vata nibbaana.m yatthida.m evaruupa.m dukkha.m na sa.mvijjatii'''ti.
[03] ``sukhinii hotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa; arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaayatuu''ti. saha vacanaa ca pana bhagavato suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaayi.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so koliyaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena saka.m ghara.m tena paccaayaasi. addasaa kho so koliyaputto suppavaasa.m koliyadhiitara.m sukhini.m aroga.m aroga.m ^a^M0.0095^ea^ putta.m vijaata.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naamaaya.m suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa saha vacanaa ca pana {saha vacanaa pana (pii0), saha vacanaa (?)} bhagavato sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaayissatii''ti! attamano pamudito piitisomanassajaato ahosi.

[03] atha kho suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa saamika.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ayyaputta, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena bhagavato paade sirasaa vandaahi -- `suppavaasaa, bhante, koliyadhiitaa bhagavato paade sirasaa vandatii'ti; eva~nca vadehi -- `suppavaasaa, bhante, koliyadhiitaa satta vassaani gabbha.m dhaareti. sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhaa saa etarahi sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaataa. saa sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m ^a^T0.0096^ea^ bhikkhusa"ngha.m bhattena nimanteti. adhivaasetu kira, bhante, bhagavaa suppavaasaaya koliyadhiitaaya satta bhattaani saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa'''ti.

[03] ``parama''nti kho so koliyaputto suppavaasaaya koliyadhiitaaya pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so koliyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``suppavaasaa ^a^V0.0087^ea^, bhante, koliyadhiitaa bhagavato paade sirasaa vandati; eva~nca vadeti -- `suppavaasaa, bhante, koliyadhiitaa satta vassaani gabbha.m dhaareti. sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhaa saa etarahi sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaataa. saa sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m bhattena nimanteti. adhivaasetu kira, bhante, bhagavaa suppavaasaaya koliyadhiitaaya satta bhattaani saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa'''ti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena a~n~natarena upaasakena buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho svaatanaaya bhattena nimantito hoti. so ca upaasako aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa {mahaamoggalaanassa (ka0)} upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, moggallaana, yena so upaasako tenupasa"nkama ^a^P0.0017^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m upaasaka.m eva.m vadehi -- `suppavaasaa, aavuso, koliyadhiitaa satta ^a^M0.0096^ea^ vassaani gabbha.m dhaaresi. sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhaa saa etarahi sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaataa. saa sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m bhattena ^a^T0.0097^ea^ nimanteti. karotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa satta bhattaani, pacchaa tva.m karissasii'ti {karissasiiti sa~n~naapehi (ka0)}. tuyheso upa.t.thaako''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena so upaasako tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m upaasaka.m etadavoca -- ``suppavaasaa, aavuso, koliyadhiitaa satta vassaani gabbha.m dhaareti. sattaaha.m muu.lhagabbhaa saa etarahi sukhinii arogaa aroga.m putta.m vijaataa. saa sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m bhattena nimanteti. karotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa satta bhattaani, pacchaa tva.m karissasii''ti.

[03] ``sace me, bhante, ayyo mahaamoggallaano ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m paa.tibhogo -- bhogaana~nca jiivitassa ca saddhaaya ca, karotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa satta bhattaani, pacchaaha.m karissaamii''ti. ``dvinna.m kho te aha.m {dvinna.m kho tesa.m (pii0), dvinna.m kho nesa.m (ka0)}, aavuso, dhammaana.m paa.tibhogo -- bhogaana~nca jiivitassa ca. saddhaaya pana tva.myeva paa.tibhogo''ti.
[03] ``sace me, bhante, ayyo mahaamoggallaano dvinna.m dhammaana.m paa.tibhogo -- bhogaana~nca jiivitassa ca, karotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa satta bhattaani, pacchaaha.m karissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano ta.m upaasaka.m sa~n~naapetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V0.0088^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``sa~n~natto {sa~n~naato (syaa0)}, bhante, so upaasako mayaa; karotu suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa satta bhattaani, pacchaa so karissatii''ti.

[03] atha kho suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa sattaaha.m buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi ^a^T0.0098^ea^ sampavaaresi, ta~nca daaraka.m bhagavanta.m vandaapesi sabba~nca bhikkhusa"ngha.m.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0097^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto ta.m daaraka.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, daaraka, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci na ki~nci dukkha''nti? ``kuto me, bhante saariputta, khamaniiya.m, kuto yaapaniiya.m! satta me vassaani lohitakumbhiya.m vuttaanii''ti.

[03] atha kho suppavaasaa koliyadhiitaa -- ``putto me dhammasenaapatinaa saddhi.m mantetii''ti attamanaa pamuditaa piitisomanassajaataa ahosi. atha kho bhagavaa (suppavaasa.m koliiyadhiitara.m attamana.m pamudita.m piitisomanassajaata.m viditvaa {disvaa (sii0)}) {( ) natthi i"ngalisapotthake} suppavaasa.m koliyadhiitara.m etadavoca -- ``iccheyyaasi tva.m, suppavaase, a~n~nampi evaruupa.m putta''nti? ``iccheyyaamaha.m, bhagavaa, a~n~naanipi evaruupaani satta puttaanii''ti ^a^P0.0018^ea^.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``asaata.m saataruupena, piyaruupena appiya.m.
[22] dukkha.m sukhassa ruupena, pamattamativattatii''ti.. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena visaakhaaya migaaramaatuyaa kocideva attho ra~n~ne pasenadimhi kosale pa.tibaddho {pa.tibandho (pii0 ka0)} hoti. ta.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo na yathaadhippaaya.m tiireti ^a^T0.0099^ea^.

[03] atha kho visaakhaa migaaramaataa divaa divassa {divaadivasseva (syaa0), divaadivasseyeva (pii0), divaa divassayeva (ka0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho visaakha.m migaaramaatara.m bhagavaa ^a^V0.0089^ea^ etadavoca -- ``handa kuto nu tva.m, visaakhe, aagacchasi divaa divassaa''ti? ``idha me, bhante, kocideva attho ra~n~ne pasenadimhi kosale pa.tibaddho; ta.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo na yathaadhippaaya.m tiiretii''ti.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0098^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sabba.m paravasa.m dukkha.m, sabba.m issariya.m sukha.m.
[22] saadhaara.ne viha~n~nanti, yogaa hi duratikkamaa''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa anupiyaaya.m viharati ambavane. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa bhaddiyo kaa.liigodhaaya putto ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha''nti!

[03] assosu.m kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu aayasmato bhaddiyassa kaa.liigodhaaya puttassa ara~n~nagatassapi rukkhamuulagatassapi su~n~naagaaragatassapi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanentassa -- ``aho sukha.m, aho sukha''nti! sutvaana nesa.m etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho, aavuso, aayasmaa bhaddiyo kaa.liigodhaaya putto anabhirato brahmacariya.m carati, ya.msa pubbe agaariyabhuutassa {agaarikabhuutassa (syaa0)} rajjasukha.m, so tamanussaramaano ara~n~nagatopi ^a^P0.0019^ea^ rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi ^a^T0.0100^ea^ abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti!

[03] atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, bhaddiyo kaa.liigodhaaya putto ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'nti! nissa.msaya.m kho, bhante, aayasmaa bhaddiyo kaa.liigodhaaya putto anabhirato brahmacariya.m carati. ya.msa pubbe agaariyabhuutassa rajjasukha.m, so tamanussaramaano ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti!

[03] atha ^a^M0.0099^ea^ ^a^V0.0090^ea^ kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena bhaddiya.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso bhaddiya, aamantetii'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa bhaddiyo kaa.liigodhaaya putto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhaddiya.m kaa.liigodhaaya putta.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso bhaddiya, aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa bhaddiyo kaa.liigodhaaya putto tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m bhaddiya.m kaa.liigodhaaya putta.m bhagavaa etadavoca --
[03] ``sacca.m kira tva.m, bhaddiya, ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti! ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana {ka.m pana (syaa pii0)} tva.m, bhaddiya, atthavasa.m sampassamaano ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi ^a^T0.0101^ea^ abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti! ``pubbe me, bhante, agaariyabhuutassa rajja.m kaarentassa antopi antepure rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa ahosi, bahipi antepure rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa ahosi, antopi nagare rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa ahosi, bahipi nagare rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa ahosi, antopi janapade rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa ahosi, bahipi janapade rakkhaa susa.mvihitaa ahosi. so kho aha.m, bhante, eva.m rakkhito gopito santo bhiito ubbiggo ussa"nkii utraasii vihaasi.m. etarahi kho panaaha.m, bhante, ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi eko {ekako (syaa0 pii0)} abhiito anubbiggo anussa"nkii anutraasii appossukko pannalomo paradattavutto {paradavutto (ka0 sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, migabhuutena cetasaa viharaami. ima.m {ida.m (sii0 ka0)} kho aha.m, bhante, atthavasa.m sampassamaano ara~n~nagatopi ^a^P0.0020^ea^ rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi abhikkha.na.m udaana.m udaanesi {udaanemi (ka0)} -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'''nti!
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yassantarato ^a^M0.0100^ea^ na santi kopaa,
[27] itibhavaabhavata~nca viitivatto.
[26] ta.m ^a^V0.0091^ea^ vigatabhaya.m sukhi.m asoka.m,
[22] devaa naanubhavanti dassanaayaa''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] mucalindavaggo dutiyo ni.t.thito.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] mucalindo ^a^T0.0102^ea^ raajaa da.n.dena, sakkaaro upaasakena ca.
[27] gabbhinii ekaputto ca, suppavaasaa visaakhaa ca.
[22] kaa.liigodhaaya bhaddiyoti..

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P0.0021^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya puraa.nakammavipaakaja.m dukkha.m tibba.m khara.m ka.tuka.m vedana.m adhivaasento sato sampajaano aviha~n~namaano.

[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa ta.m bhikkhu.m aviduure nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya puraa.nakammavipaakaja.m dukkha.m tibba.m khara.m ka.tuka.m vedana.m adhivaasenta.m sata.m sampajaana.m aviha~n~namaana.m.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sabbakammajahassa bhikkhuno,
[27] dhunamaanassa pure kata.m raja.m.
[26] amamassa ^a^V0.0092^ea^ .thitassa taadino,
[22] attho natthi jana.m lapetave''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0101^ea^ ^a^T0.0103^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa nando bhagavato bhaataa maatucchaaputto sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m evamaaroceti -- ``anabhirato aha.m, aavuso, brahmacariya.m caraami; na sakkomi brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, nando bhagavato bhaataa maatucchaaputto sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m evamaaroceti -- `anabhirato aha.m, aavuso, brahmacariya.m caraami, na sakkomi brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkha.m paccakkhaaya ^a^P0.0022^ea^ hiinaayaavattissaamii'''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena nanda.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso nanda, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa nando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m nanda.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso nanda, aamantetii''ti.

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa nando tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m nanda.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``sacca.m kira tva.m, nanda, sambahulaana.m bhikkhuuna.m evamaarocesi -- `anabhirato aha.m, aavuso, brahmacariya.m caraami, na sakkomi brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamii'''ti ^a^T0.0104^ea^? ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] ``kissa pana tva.m, nanda, anabhirato brahmacariya.m carasi, na sakkosi brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m ^a^V0.0093^ea^, sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissasii''ti? ``saakiyaanii ma.m {mama (syaa0, a.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa)}, bhante, janapadakalyaa.nii gharaa nikkhamantassa {nikkhamanta.m (a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantara.m)} upa.d.dhullikhitehi kesehi apaloketvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `tuva.ta.m kho, ayyaputta, aagaccheyyaasii'ti. so ^a^M0.0102^ea^ kho aha.m, bhante, tamanussaramaano anabhirato brahmacariya.m caraami, na sakkomi brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m nanda.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m {sammi~njita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya {sammi~njeyya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, evameva -- jetavane antarahito devesu taavati.msesu paaturahosi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaani accharaasataani sakkassa devaanamindassa upa.t.thaana.m aagataani honti kaku.tapaadaani. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m nanda.m aamantesi -- ``passasi no tva.m, nanda, imaani pa~nca accharaasataani kaku.tapaadaanii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, nanda, katamaa nu kho abhiruupataraa vaa dassaniiyataraa vaa paasaadikataraa vaa, saakiyaanii vaa janapadakalyaa.nii, imaani vaa pa~nca accharaasataani kaku.tapaadaanii''ti? ``seyyathaapi, bhante, palu.t.thamakka.tii ka.n.nanaasacchinnaa, evameva kho, bhante, saakiyaanii janapadakalyaa.nii ^a^T0.0105^ea^ imesa.m pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m ^a^P0.0023^ea^ upanidhaaya sa"nkhyampi {sa"nkhampi (sii0)} nopeti kalabhaagampi nopeti upanidhimpi nopeti. atha kho imaani pa~nca accharaasataani abhiruupataraani ceva dassaniiyataraani ca paasaadikataraani caa''ti.

[03] ``abhirama, nanda, abhirama, nanda! aha.m te paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadaana''nti. ``sace me, bhante, bhagavaa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadaana.m, abhiramissaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavati brahmacariye''ti {bhagavaa brahmacariyeti (syaa0 pii0), bhagavaa brahmacariyanti (ka0)}.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m nanda.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- devesu taavati.msesu antarahito jetavane paaturahosi.

[03] assosu.m ^a^M0.0103^ea^ kho bhikkhuu -- ``aayasmaa kira nando bhagavato bhaataa maatucchaaputto accharaana.m ^a^V0.0094^ea^ hetu brahmacariya.m carati; bhagavaa kirassa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadaana''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmato nandassa sahaayakaa bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m nanda.m bhatakavaadena ca upakkitakavaadena ca samudaacaranti -- ``bhatako kiraayasmaa nando upakkitako kiraayasmaa nando accharaana.m hetu brahmacariya.m carati; bhagavaa kirassa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadaana''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa nando ^a^T0.0106^ea^ sahaayakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m bhatakavaadena ca upakkitakavaadena ca a.t.tiiyamaano haraayamaano jigucchamaano eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa nando arahata.m ahosi.

[03] atha kho a~n~nataraa devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, nando bhagavato bhaataa maatucchaaputto aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^P0.0024^ea^ sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. bhagavatopi kho ~naa.na.m udapaadi -- ``nando aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa nando tassaa rattiyaa accayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa nando ^a^T0.0107^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ya.m me, bhante, bhagavaa paa.tibhogo pa~ncanna.m accharaasataana.m pa.tilaabhaaya kaku.tapaadaana.m, mu~ncaamaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m etasmaa pa.tissavaa''ti. ``mayaapi kho ^a^M0.0104^ea^ tva.m, nanda {kho te nanda (sii0 syaa0 pii0), kho nanda (ka0)}, cetasaa ceto paricca vidito -- `nando aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. devataapi me etamattha.m aarocesi -- `aayasmaa, bhante, nando bhagavato bhaataa maatucchaaputto aasavaana.m khayaa ^a^V0.0095^ea^ anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. yadeva kho te, nanda, anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, athaaha.m mutto etasmaa pa.tissavaa''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yassa nitti.n.no pa"nko,
[27] maddito kaamaka.n.tako.
[26] mohakkhaya.m anuppatto,
[22] sukhadukkhesu na vedhatii sa bhikkhuu''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena yasojappamukhaani pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani saavatthi.m anuppattaani honti bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. tedha kho aagantukaa bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa {uccaasaddamahaasaddaa (ka0)} ahesu.m ^a^T0.0108^ea^.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``ke panete, aananda, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? ``etaani, bhante, yasojappamukhaani pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani saavatthi.m anuppattaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. tete aagantukaa bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa''ti. ``tenahaananda, mama vacanena te bhikkhuu aamantehi -- `satthaa aayasmante aamantetii'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^M0.0105^ea^, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami ^a^P0.0025^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante aamantetii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato aanandassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu ^a^V0.0096^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinne kho te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa, keva.t.taa ma~n~ne macchavilope''ti? eva.m vutte, aayasmaa yasojo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imaani, bhante, pa~ncamattaani bhikkhusataani saavatthi.m anuppattaani bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. teme aagantukaa bhikkhuu nevaasikehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m pa.tisammodamaanaa senaasanaani pa~n~naapayamaanaa pattaciivaraani pa.tisaamayamaanaa uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa''ti. ``gacchatha, bhikkhave, pa.naamemi ^a^T0.0109^ea^ vo {vo pa.naamemi (sabbattha) ma0 ni0 2.157 passitabba.m}; na vo mama santike vatthabba''nti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa {pa.tisa.msaametvaa (syaa0)} pattaciivaramaadaaya yena vajjii tena caarika.m pakkami.msu. vajjiisu anupubbena caarika.m caramaanaa yena vaggumudaa nadii tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa vaggumudaaya nadiyaa tiire pa.n.naku.tiyo karitvaa vassa.m upagacchi.msu.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa yasojo vassuupagato {vassuupagate (ka0)} bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhagavataa maya.m, aavuso, pa.naamitaa atthakaamena hitesinaa, anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya. handa maya.m, aavuso, tathaa vihaara.m kappema yathaa no viharata.m bhagavaa attamano assaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato yasojassa paccassosu.m. atha kho te bhikkhuu vuupaka.t.thaa appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharantaa tenevantaravassena sabbeva tisso vijjaa sacchaaka.msu.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m yathaabhiranta.m viharitvaa yena vesaalii tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena vesaalii tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0106^ea^ kho bhagavaa vaggumudaatiiriyaana.m bhikkhuuna.m cetasaa ceto paricca manasi karitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aalokajaataa viya me, aananda, esaa disaa, obhaasajaataa viya me, aananda, esaa disaa; yassa.m disaaya.m {yaaya.m (ka0)} vaggumudaatiiriyaa bhikkhuu ^a^T0.0110^ea^ viharanti. gantu.m appa.tikuulaasi ^a^P0.0026^ea^ me manasi kaatu.m. pahi.neyyaasi tva.m, aananda, vaggumudaatiiriyaana.m ^a^V0.0097^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m santike duuta.m -- `satthaa aayasmante aamanteti, satthaa aayasmantaana.m dassanakaamo'''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yena a~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``ehi tva.m, aavuso, yena vaggumudaatiiriyaa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu eva.m vadehi -- `satthaa aayasmante aamanteti, satthaa aayasmantaana.m dassanakaamo'''ti.

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho so bhikkhu aayasmato aanandassa pa.tissutvaa -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m antarahito vaggumudaaya nadiyaa tiire tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m purato paaturahosi. atha kho so bhikkhu vaggumudaatiiriye bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``satthaa aayasmante aamanteti, satthaa aayasmantaana.m dassanakaamo''ti.

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva -- vaggumudaaya nadiyaa tiire antarahitaa mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m bhagavato sammukhe paaturahesu.m. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa aane~njena samaadhinaa nisinno ^a^T0.0111^ea^ hoti. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``katamena nu kho bhagavaa vihaarena etarahi viharatii''ti? atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aane~njena kho bhagavaa vihaarena etarahi viharatii''ti. sabbeva aane~njasamaadhinaa nisiidi.msu.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0107^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa, nikkhante pa.thame yaame, u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m {ciivara.m (sabbattha)} karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto pa.thamo yaamo; ciranisinnaa aagantukaa bhikkhuu; pa.tisammodatu, bhante, bhagavaa aagantukehi bhikkhuuhii''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] dutiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa, nikkhante majjhime yaame, u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ^a^P0.0027^ea^ bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^V0.0098^ea^ -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto majjhimo yaamo; ciranisinnaa aagantukaa bhikkhuu; pa.tisammodatu, bhante, bhagavaa aagantukehi bhikkhuuhii''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] tatiyampi kho aayasmaa aanando abhikkantaaya rattiyaa, nikkhante pacchime yaame, uddhaste aru.ne, nandimukhiyaa rattiyaa u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkantaa, bhante, ratti; nikkhanto pacchimo yaamo; uddhasto aru.no; nandimukhii ratti; ciranisinnaa aagantukaa bhikkhuu; pa.tisammodatu, bhante, bhagavaa, aagantukehi ^a^T0.0112^ea^ bhikkhuuhii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thahitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``sace kho tva.m, aananda, jaaneyyaasi ettakampi te nappa.tibhaaseyya {nappa.tibheyya (?)}. aha~nca, aananda, imaani ca pa~nca bhikkhusataani sabbeva aane~njasamaadhinaa nisiidimhaa''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yassa jito kaamaka.n.tako,
[27] akkoso ca vadho ca bandhana~nca.
[26] pabbatova {pabbato viya (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} so .thito anejo,
[22] sukhadukkhesu na vedhatii sa bhikkhuu''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0108^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aviduure nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yathaapi ^a^V0.0099^ea^ pabbato selo, acalo suppati.t.thito.
[22] eva.m mohakkhayaa bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhatii''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena ^a^P0.0028^ea^ aayasmaa ^a^T0.0113^ea^ mahaamoggallaano bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya kaayagataaya satiyaa ajjhatta.m suupa.t.thitaaya. addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m aviduure nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya kaayagataaya satiyaa ajjhatta.m suupa.t.thitaaya.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sati kaayagataa upa.t.thitaa,
[27] chasu phassaayatanesu sa.mvuto.
[26] satata.m bhikkhu samaahito,
[22] ja~n~naa nibbaanamattano''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0109^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa pilindavaccho {pilindivaccho (sii0)} bhikkhuu vasalavaadena samudaacarati. atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``aayasmaa, bhante, pilindavaccho bhikkhuu vasalavaadena samudaacaratii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa a~n~natara.m bhikkhu.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, bhikkhu, mama vacanena pilindavaccha.m bhikkhu.m aamantehi -- `satthaa ta.m, aavuso pilindavaccha {vaccha (syaa0)}, aamantetii'''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa pilindavaccho tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^V0.0100^ea^ aayasmanta.m ^a^T0.0114^ea^ pilindavaccha.m etadavoca -- ``satthaa ta.m, aavuso pilindavaccha, aamantetii''ti.

[03] ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa pilindavaccho tassa bhikkhuno pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m pilindavaccha.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira tva.m, vaccha, bhikkhuu vasalavaadena samudaacarasii''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato pilindavacchassa pubbenivaasa.m manasi karitvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``maa kho tumhe, bhikkhave, vacchassa bhikkhuno ujjhaayittha. na, bhikkhave, vaccho dosantaro bhikkhuu vasalavaadena samudaacarati. vacchassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pa~nca jaatisataani abboki.n.naani braahma.nakule paccaajaataani. so tassa vasalavaado diigharatta.m ^a^P0.0029^ea^ samudaaci.n.no {ajjhaaci.n.no (syaa0 pii0 ka0 a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantara.m)}. tenaaya.m vaccho bhikkhuu vasalavaadena samudaacaratii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yamhii ^a^M0.0110^ea^ na maayaa vasatii na maano,
[27] yo viitalobho amamo niraaso.
[26] panu.n.nakodho {pa.nunnakodho (pii0)} abhinibbutatto,
[22] so braahma.no so sama.no sa bhikkhuu''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahaakassapo pippaliguhaaya.m viharati, sattaaha.m ekapalla"nkena nisinno hoti a~n~natara.m ^a^T0.0115^ea^ {nisinno a~n~natara.m (syaa0 ka0)} samaadhi.m samaapajjitvaa. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo tassa sattaahassa accayena tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thaasi. atha kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa tamhaa samaadhimhaa vu.t.thitassa etadahosi -- ``ya.mnuunaaha.m raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paviseyya''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena pa~ncamattaani devataasataani ussukka.m aapannaani honti aayasmato ^a^V0.0101^ea^ mahaakassapassa pi.n.dapaatapa.tilaabhaaya. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo taani pa~ncamattaani devataasataani pa.tikkhipitvaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena sakko devaanamindo aayasmato mahaakassapassa pi.n.dapaata.m daatukaamo hoti. pesakaarava.n.na.m abhinimminitvaa tanta.m vinaati. sujaa {sujaataa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} asuraka~n~naa tasara.m puureti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo raajagahe sapadaana.m pi.n.daaya caramaano yena sakkassa devaanamindassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho sakko devaanamindo aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaana gharaa nikkhamitvaa paccugantvaa hatthato patta.m gahetvaa ghara.m pavisitvaa {pavisetvaa (ka0)} gha.tiyaa odana.m uddharitvaa patta.m puuretvaa aayasmato mahaakassapassa adaasi. so ahosi pi.n.dapaato anekasuupo anekabya~njano anekarasabya~njano {anekasuuparasabya~njano (sii0 pii0)}. atha kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa etadahosi -- ``ko nu kho aya.m satto yassaaya.m ^a^P0.0030^ea^ evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo''ti ^a^M0.0111^ea^? atha kho aayasmato mahaakassapassa etadahosi -- ``sakko kho ^a^T0.0116^ea^ aya.m devaanamindo''ti. iti viditvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- ``kata.m kho te ida.m, kosiya; maa {maassu (sii0 syaa0)} punapi evaruupamakaasii''ti. ``amhaakampi, bhante kassapa, pu~n~nena attho; amhaakampi pu~n~nena kara.niiya''nti.

[03] atha kho sakko devaanamindo aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanesi -- ``aho daana.m paramadaana.m {parama.m daana.m (pii0 ka0)} kassape suppati.t.thita.m! aho daana.m paramadaana.m kassape suppati.t.thita.m!! aho daana.m paramadaana.m kassape suppati.t.thita''nti!!! assosi kho bhagavaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya sakkassa devaanamindassa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa aakaase antalikkhe tikkhattu.m udaana.m udaanentassa -- ``aho daana.m paramadaana.m kassape suppati.t.thita.m! aho daana.m paramadaana.m kassape suppati.t.thita.m!! aho daana.m paramadaana.m kassape suppati.t.thita''nti!!!
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``pi.n.dapaatikassa bhikkhuno,
[27] attabharassa ana~n~naposino.
[26] devaa ^a^V0.0102^ea^ pihayanti taadino,
