[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m, meghiya, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa ya.m aaraddhaviiriyo viharissati ^a^T0.0128^ea^ akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] ``kalyaa.namittasseta.m, meghiya, bhikkhuno paa.tika"nkha.m kalyaa.nasahaayassa kalyaa.nasampava"nkassa ya.m pa~n~navaa bhavissati, udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaa dukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.

[03] ``tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhunaa imesu pa~ncasu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya cattaaro dhammaa uttari bhaavetabbaa -- asubhaa bhaavetabbaa raagassa pahaanaaya, mettaa bhaavetabbaa byaapaadassa pahaanaaya, aanaapaanassati bhaavetabbaa vitakkupacchedaaya, aniccasa~n~naa bhaavetabbaa asmimaanasamugghaataaya. aniccasa~n~nino hi, meghiya, anattasa~n~naa sa.n.thaati, anattasa~n~nii asmimaanasamugghaata.m paapu.naati di.t.theva dhamme nibbaana''nti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``khuddaa ^a^M0.0121^ea^ vitakkaa sukhumaa vitakkaa,
[27] anugataa {anuggataa (sii0 ka0 a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantara.m)} manaso uppilaavaa {ubbilaapaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.
[26] ete avidvaa manaso vitakke,
[22] huraa hura.m dhaavati bhantacitto..
[21] ``ete ca vidvaa manaso vitakke,
[27] aataapiyo sa.mvaratii satiimaa.
[26] anugate ^a^V0.0111^ea^ ^a^T0.0129^ea^ manaso uppilaave,
[22] asesamete pajahaasi buddho''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kusinaaraaya.m viharati upavattane mallaana.m saalavane. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu bhagavato aviduure ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m viharanti uddhataa unna.laa capalaa mukharaa viki.n.navaacaa mu.t.thassatino asampajaanaa asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa paakatindriyaa.

[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa te sambahule ^a^P0.0038^ea^ bhikkhuu aviduure ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m viharante uddhate unna.le capale mukhare viki.n.navaace mu.t.thassatino asampajaane asamaahite vibbhantacitte paakatindriye.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``arakkhitena kaayena {cittena (nettiya.m)}, micchaadi.t.thihatena {micchaadi.t.thigatena (bahuusu)} ca.
[22] thinamiddhaa {thiinamiddhaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} bhibhuutena, vasa.m maarassa gacchati..
[21] ``tasmaa rakkhitacittassa, sammaasa"nkappagocaro.
[27] sammaadi.t.thipurekkhaaro, ~natvaana udayabbaya.m.
[22] thiinamiddhaabhibhuu bhikkhu, sabbaa duggatiyo jahe''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0122^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m carati mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m. atha kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma yena a~n~natara.m rukkhamuula.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.

[03] atha kho a~n~nataro gopaalako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami ^a^T0.0130^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ^a^V0.0112^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m gopaalaka.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi {samaadaapesi (?)} samuttejesi sampaha.msesi.

[03] atha kho so gopaalako bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito {samaadipito (?)} samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me, bhante, bhagavaa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho so gopaalako bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho so gopaalako tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pahuuta.m appodakapaayasa.m {appodakapaayaasa.m (sabbattha)} pa.tiyaadaapetvaa nava~nca sappi.m bhagavato kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena tassa gopaalakassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho so gopaalako buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m appodakapaayasena {appodakapaayaasena ca (syaa0 pii0)} navena ca sappinaa sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho so gopaalako bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m ^a^P0.0039^ea^ aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m gopaalaka.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami. atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato ta.m gopaalaka.m a~n~nataro ^a^T0.0131^ea^ puriso siimantarikaaya jiivitaa voropesi.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0123^ea^ kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``yena, bhante, gopaalakena ajja buddhappamukho bhikkhusa"ngho appodakapaayasena navena ca sappinaa sahatthaa santappito sampavaarito so kira, bhante, gopaalako a~n~natarena purisena siimantarikaaya jiivitaa voropito''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``diso disa.m ya.m ta.m kayiraa, verii vaa pana verina.m.
[22] micchaapa.nihita.m citta.m, paapiyo na.m tato kare''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V0.0113^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano kapotakandaraaya.m viharanti. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto ju.nhaaya rattiyaa navoropitehi kesehi abbhokaase nisinno hoti a~n~natara.m samaadhi.m samaapajjitvaa.

[03] tena kho pana samayena dve yakkhaa sahaayakaa uttaraaya disaaya dakkhi.na.m disa.m gacchanti kenacideva kara.niiyena. addasa.msu kho te yakkhaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m ju.nhaaya rattiyaa navoropitehi kesehi abbhokaase nisinna.m. disvaana eko yakkho dutiya.m yakkha.m etadavoca ^a^T0.0132^ea^ -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, samma, imassa sama.nassa siise pahaara.m daatu''nti. eva.m vutte, so yakkho ta.m yakkha.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, samma, maa sama.na.m aasaadesi. u.laaro so, samma, sama.no mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo''ti.

[03] dutiyampi kho so yakkho ta.m yakkha.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, samma, imassa sama.nassa ^a^P0.0040^ea^ siise pahaara.m daatu''nti. dutiyampi kho so yakkho ta.m yakkha.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, samma, maa sama.na.m aasaadesi. u.laaro so, samma, sama.no mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo''ti. tatiyampi kho so yakkho ta.m yakkha.m etadavoca -- ``pa.tibhaati ma.m, samma, imassa sama.nassa siise pahaara.m ^a^M0.0124^ea^ daatu''nti. tatiyampi kho so yakkho ta.m yakkha.m etadavoca -- ``ala.m, samma, maa sama.na.m aasaadesi. u.laaro so, samma, sama.no mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo''ti.

[03] atha kho so yakkho ta.m yakkha.m anaadiyitvaa aayasmato saariputtattherassa siise pahaara.m adaasi. taava mahaa pahaaro ahosi, api tena pahaarena sattaratana.m vaa a.d.dha.t.thamaratana.m vaa naaga.m osaadeyya, mahanta.m vaa pabbatakuu.ta.m padaaleyya. atha ca pana so yakkho `.dayhaami .dayhaamii'ti vatvaa tattheva mahaaniraya.m apataasi {avatthaasi (ka0 sii0)}.

[03] addasaa kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena tena yakkhena aayasmato saariputtattherassa siise pahaara.m diiyamaana.m. disvaa yena aayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``kacci ^a^V0.0114^ea^ te, aavuso, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci na ki~nci dukkha''nti ^a^T0.0133^ea^? ``khamaniiya.m me, aavuso moggallaana, yaapaniiya.m me, aavuso moggallaana; api ca me siisa.m thoka.m dukkha''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, aavuso saariputta, abbhuta.m, aavuso saariputta! yaava {ya.m tva.m (sii0 ka0), ya.m (syaa0)} mahiddhiko aayasmaa saariputto mahaanubhaavo! idha te, aavuso saariputta, a~n~nataro yakkho siise pahaara.m adaasi. taava mahaa pahaaro ahosi, api tena pahaarena sattaratana.m vaa a.d.dha.t.thamaratana.m vaa naaga.m osaadeyya, mahanta.m vaa pabbatakuu.ta.m padaaleyya, atha ca panaayasmaa saariputto evamaaha -- `khamaniiya.m me, aavuso moggallaana, yaapaniiya.m me, aavuso moggallaana; api ca me siisa.m thoka.m dukkha'''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, aavuso moggallaana, abbhuta.m, aavuso moggallaana! yaava {ya.m (syaa0)} mahiddhiko aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano mahaanubhaavo yatra hi naama yakkhampi passissati! maya.m panetarahi pa.msupisaacakampi na passaamaa''ti.
[03] assosi kho bhagavaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya tesa.m ubhinna.m mahaanaagaana.m ima.m evaruupa.m kathaasallaapa.m.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0125^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``yassa ^a^P0.0041^ea^ seluupama.m citta.m, .thita.m naanupakampati.
[27] viratta.m rajaniiyesu, kopaneyye na kuppati.
[22] yasseva.m bhaavita.m citta.m, kuto ta.m dukkhamessatii''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame ^a^T0.0134^ea^. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa aaki.n.no viharati bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi raajuuhi raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi. aaki.n.no dukkha.m na phaasu viharati. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``aha.m kho etarahi aaki.n.no viharaami bhikkhuuhi ^a^V0.0115^ea^ bhikkhuuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi raajuuhi raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi. aaki.n.no dukkha.m na phaasu viharaami. ya.mnuunaaha.m eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho vihareyya''nti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya kosambi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. kosambiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto saama.m senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya anaamantetvaa upa.t.thaaka.m anapaloketvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m eko adutiyo yena paalileyyaka.m tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena paalileyyaka.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa paalileyyake viharati rakkhitavanasa.n.de bhaddasaalamuule.

[03] a~n~nataropi kho hatthinaago aaki.n.no viharati hatthiihi hatthiniihi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchaapehi. chinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadati, obhaggobhagga~ncassa saakhaabha"nga.m khaadanti, aavilaani ca paaniiyaani pivati, ogaahaa cassa utti.n.nassa hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo gacchanti. aaki.n.no dukkha.m na phaasu viharati. atha kho tassa hatthinaagassa etadahosi -- ``aha.m kho etarahi aaki.n.no viharaami ^a^T0.0135^ea^ hatthiihi hatthiniihi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchaapehi, chinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadaami, obhaggobhagga~nca me saakhaabha"nga.m khaadanti, aavilaani ca paaniiyaani pivaami, ogaahaa ca me utti.n.nassa ^a^M0.0126^ea^ hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo gacchanti, aaki.n.no dukkha.m na phaasu viharaami. ya.mnuunaaha.m eko ga.nasmaa vuupaka.t.tho vihareyya''nti.

[03] atha kho so hatthinaago yuuthaa apakkamma yena paalileyyaka.m rakkhitavanasa.n.do ^a^P0.0042^ea^ bhaddasaalamuula.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. tatra suda.m {upasa"nkamitvaa tatra suda.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} so hatthinaago yasmi.m padese bhagavaa viharati ta.m padesa.m {appaharita~nca karoti, so.n.daaya (bahuusu)} appaharita.m karoti, so.n.daaya ca {appaharita~nca karoti, so.n.daaya (bahuusu)} bhagavato paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thaapeti {upa.t.thapeti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``aha.m kho pubbe aaki.n.no vihaasi.m bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi raajuuhi raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi, aaki.n.no dukkha.m na phaasu vihaasi.m. somhi etarahi anaaki.n.no viharaami bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi raajuuhi raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi, anaaki.n.no sukha.m phaasu viharaamii''ti.

[03] tassapi ^a^V0.0116^ea^ kho hatthinaagassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``aha.m kho pubbe aaki.n.no vihaasi.m hatthiihi hatthiniihi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchaapehi, chinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadi.m, obhaggobhagga~nca me saakhaabha"nga.m khaadi.msu, aavilaani ca paaniiyaani apaayi.m, ogaahaa ^a^T0.0136^ea^ ca me utti.n.nassa hatthiniyo kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo agama.msu, aaki.n.no dukkha.m na phaasu vihaasi.m. somhi etarahi anaaki.n.no viharaami hatthiihi hatthiniihi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchaapehi, acchinnaggaani ceva ti.naani khaadaami, obhaggobhagga~nca me saakhaabha"nga.m na khaadanti, anaavilaani ca paaniiyaani pivaami, ogaahaa ca me utti.n.nassa hatthiniyo na kaaya.m upanigha.msantiyo gacchanti, anaaki.n.no sukha.m phaasu viharaamii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa attano ca paviveka.m viditvaa tassa ca hatthinaagassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``eta.m ^a^M0.0127^ea^ {eva.m (ka0)} naagassa naagena, iisaadantassa hatthino.
[22] sameti citta.m cittena, yadeko ramatii mano''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya aara~n~niko pi.n.dapaatiko pa.msukuuliko teciivariko appiccho santu.t.tho pavivitto asa.msa.t.tho aaraddhaviiriyo {aaraddhaviriyo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhutavaado adhicittamanuyutto.

[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m pi.n.dolabhaaradvaaja.m ^a^P0.0043^ea^ aviduure nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya aara~n~nika.m pi.n.dapaatika.m pa.msukuulika.m teciivarika.m appiccha.m santu.t.tha.m pavivitta.m asa.msa.t.tha.m aaraddhaviiriya.m dhutavaada.m adhicittamanuyutta.m ^a^T0.0137^ea^.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``anuupavaado ^a^V0.0117^ea^ anuupaghaato {anupavaado anupaghaato (syaa0 pii0 ka0)}, paatimokkhe ca sa.mvaro.
[27] matta~n~nutaa ca bhattasmi.m, panta~nca sayanaasana.m.
[22] adhicitte ca aayogo, eta.m buddhaana saasana''nti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya appiccho santu.t.tho pavivitto asa.msa.t.tho aaraddhaviiriyo adhicittamanuyutto.

[03] addasaa ^a^M0.0128^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aviduure nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya appiccha.m santu.t.tha.m pavivitta.m asa.msa.t.tha.m aaraddhaviiriya.m adhicittamanuyutta.m.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``adhicetaso appamajjato,
[27] munino monapathesu sikkhato.
[26] sokaa na bhavanti taadino,
[22] upasantassa sadaa satiimato''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa sakkato hoti garukato maanito puujito apacito laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m ^a^T0.0138^ea^. bhikkhusa"nghopi sakkato hoti garukato maanito puujito apacito laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. a~n~natitthiyaa pana paribbaajakaa asakkataa honti agarukataa amaanitaa apuujitaa anapacitaa na laabhino ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m.

[03] atha kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa bhagavato sakkaara.m asahamaanaa bhikkhusa"nghassa ca ^a^V0.0118^ea^ yena sundarii paribbaajikaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P0.0044^ea^ sundari.m paribbaajika.m etadavocu.m -- ``ussahasi tva.m, bhagini, ~naatiina.m attha.m kaatu''nti? ``kyaaha.m, ayyaa, karomi? ki.m mayaa na sakkaa {ki.m mayaa sakkaa (syaa0 pii0)} kaatu.m? jiivitampi me pariccatta.m ~naatiina.m atthaayaa''ti.

[03] ``tena hi, bhagini, abhikkha.na.m jetavana.m gacchaahii''ti. ``eva.m, ayyaa''ti kho sundarii paribbaajikaa tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m pa.tissutvaa abhikkha.na.m jetavana.m agamaasi.

[03] yadaa ^a^M0.0129^ea^ te a~n~ni.msu a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa -- ``vodi.t.thaa kho sundarii paribbaajikaa bahujanena abhikkha.na.m jetavana.m gacchatii''ti {gacchatiiti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. atha na.m jiivitaa voropetvaa tattheva jetavanassa parikhaakuupe nikkhipitvaa {nikhanitvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} yena raajaa pasenadi kosalo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavocu.m -- ``yaa saa, mahaaraaja, sundarii paribbaajikaa; saa no na dissatii''ti. ``kattha pana tumhe aasa"nkathaa''ti ^a^T0.0139^ea^? ``jetavane, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``tena hi jetavana.m vicinathaa''ti.

[03] atha kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa jetavana.m vicinitvaa yathaanikkhitta.m parikhaakuupaa uddharitvaa ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa saavatthi.m pavesetvaa rathiyaaya rathiya.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m upasa"nkamitvaa manusse ujjhaapesu.m --

[03] ``passathaayyaa sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m kamma.m! alajjino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dussiilaa paapadhammaa musaavaadino abrahmacaarino. ime hi naama dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa pa.tijaanissanti! natthi imesa.m saama~n~na.m, natthi imesa.m brahma~n~na.m. na.t.tha.m imesa.m saama~n~na.m, na.t.tha.m imesa.m brahma~n~na.m. kuto imesa.m saama~n~na.m, kuto imesa.m brahma~n~na.m? apagataa ime saama~n~naa, apagataa ime brahma~n~naa. katha~nhi naama puriso purisakicca.m karitvaa itthi.m jiivitaa voropessatii''ti!
[03] tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m manussaa bhikkhuu disvaa asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosanti paribhaasanti rosanti vihesanti --

[03] ``alajjino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dussiilaa paapadhammaa musaavaadino abrahmacaarino ^a^V0.0119^ea^. ime hi naama dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa pa.tijaanissanti! natthi imesa.m saama~n~na.m, natthi imesa.m brahma~n~na.m. na.t.tha.m imesa.m saama~n~na.m, na.t.tha.m imesa.m brahma~n~na.m. kuto imesa.m saama~n~na.m, kuto imesa.m brahma~n~na.m? apagataa ime saama~n~naa, apagataa ime ^a^T0.0140^ea^ brahma~n~naa. katha~nhi naama puriso purisakicca.m karitvaa itthi.m jiivitaa voropessatii''ti!

[03] atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.msu. saavatthiya.m ^a^P0.0045^ea^ pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa ^a^M0.0130^ea^ yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --

[03] ``etarahi, bhante, saavatthiya.m manussaa bhikkhuu disvaa asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosanti paribhaasanti rosanti vihesanti -- `alajjino ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa dussiilaa paapadhammaa musaavaadino abrahmacaarino. ime hi naama dhammacaarino samacaarino brahmacaarino saccavaadino siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa pa.tijaanissanti. natthi imesa.m saama~n~na.m, natthi imesa.m brahma~n~na.m. na.t.tha.m imesa.m saama~n~na.m, na.t.tha.m imesa.m brahma~n~na.m. kuto imesa.m saama~n~na.m, kuto imesa.m brahma~n~na.m? apagataa ime saama~n~naa, apagataa ime brahma~n~naa. katha~nhi naama puriso purisakicca.m karitvaa itthi.m jiivitaa voropessatii'''ti!

[03] ``neso, bhikkhave, saddo cira.m bhavissati sattaahameva bhavissati. sattaahassa accayena antaradhaayissati. tena hi, bhikkhave, ye manussaa bhikkhuu disvaa asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosanti paribhaasanti rosanti vihesanti, te tumhe imaaya gaathaaya pa.ticodetha --
[21] ```abhuutavaadii ^a^T0.0141^ea^ niraya.m upeti,
[27] yo vaapi {yo caapi (sii0 pii0 ka0)} katvaa na karomi caaha.
[26] ubhopi te pecca samaa bhavanti,
[22] nihiinakammaa manujaa paratthaa'''ti..

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato santike ima.m gaatha.m pariyaapu.nitvaa ye manussaa bhikkhuu disvaa ^a^V0.0120^ea^ asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosanti paribhaasanti rosanti vihesanti te imaaya gaathaaya pa.ticodenti --
[21] ``abhuutavaadii niraya.m upeti,
[27] yo vaapi katvaa na karomicaaha.
[26] ubhopi te pecca samaa bhavanti,
[22] nihiinakammaa manujaa paratthaa''ti..

[03] manussaana.m ^a^M0.0131^ea^ etadahosi -- ``akaarakaa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa. nayimehi kata.m. sapantime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa''ti. neva so saddo cira.m ahosi. sattaahameva ahosi. sattaahassa accayena antaradhaayi.
[03] atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato etadavocu.m --

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m bhante bhagavataa -- `neso, bhikkhave, saddo cira.m bhavissati. sattaahameva bhavissati. sattaahassa accayena ^a^T0.0142^ea^ antaradhaayissatii'ti. antarahito so, bhante, saddo''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``tudanti vaacaaya janaa asa~n~nataa,
[27] sarehi sa"ngaamagata.mva ku~njara.m.
[26] sutvaana vaakya.m pharusa.m udiirita.m,
[22] adhivaasaye bhikkhu adu.t.thacitto''ti.. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho aayasmato upasenassa ^a^P0.0046^ea^ va"ngantaputtassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko ^a^V0.0121^ea^ udapaadi -- ``laabhaa vata me, suladdha.m vata me, satthaa ca me bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho; svaakkhaate camhi dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito; sabrahmacaarino ca me siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa; siilesu camhi paripuurakaarii; susamaahito camhi ekaggacitto; arahaa camhi khii.naasavo; mahiddhiko camhi mahaanubhaavo. bhaddaka.m me jiivita.m, bhaddaka.m mara.na''nti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa aayasmato upasenassa va"ngantaputtassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``ya.m ^a^M0.0132^ea^ jiivita.m na tapati, mara.nante na socati.
[22] sa ve di.t.thapado dhiiro, sokamajjhe na socati..
[21] ``ucchinnabhavata.nhassa ^a^T0.0143^ea^, santacittassa bhikkhuno.
[22] vikkhii.no jaatisa.msaaro, natthi tassa punabbhavo''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato aviduure nisinno hoti palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya attano upasama.m paccavekkhamaano.
[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aviduure nisinna.m palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya attano upasama.m paccavekkhamaana.m.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``upasantasantacittassa, netticchinnassa bhikkhuno.
[22] vikkhii.no jaatisa.msaaro, mutto so maarabandhanaa''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] meghiyavaggo catuttho ni.t.thito.
[01] tassuddaana.m ^a^V0.0122^ea^ --
[21] meghiyo uddhataa gopaalo, yakkho {ju.nhaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0), ju.nha.m (ka0)} naagena pa~ncama.m.
[21] pi.n.dolo saariputto ca, sundarii bhavati a.t.thama.m.
[22] upaseno va"ngantaputto, saariputto ca te dasaati..

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0133^ea^ ^a^P0.0047^ea^ ^a^T0.0144^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena raajaa pasenadi kosalo mallikaaya deviyaa saddhi.m uparipaasaadavaragato hoti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo mallika.m devi.m etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho te, mallike, koca~n~no attanaa piyataro''ti?
[03] ``natthi kho me, mahaaraaja, koca~n~no attanaa piyataro. tuyha.m pana, mahaaraaja, attha~n~no koci attanaa piyataro''ti? ``mayhampi kho, mallike, nattha~n~no koci attanaa piyataro''ti.

[03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo paasaadaa orohitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``idhaaha.m, bhante, mallikaaya deviyaa saddhi.m uparipaasaadavaragato mallika.m devi.m etadavoca.m -- `atthi nu kho te, mallike, koca~n~no attanaa piyataro'ti? eva.m vutte, mallikaa devii ma.m etadavoca -- `natthi kho me, mahaaraaja, koca~n~no attanaa piyataro. tuyha.m pana, mahaaraaja, attha~n~no koci attanaa piyataro'ti? eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhante, mallika.m devi.m etadavoca.m -- `mayhampi kho, mallike, nattha~n~no koci attanaa piyataro'''ti.
[03] atha ^a^V0.0123^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sabbaa ^a^T0.0145^ea^ disaa anuparigamma cetasaa,
[27] nevajjhagaa piyataramattanaa kvaci.
[26] eva.m piyo puthu attaa paresa.m,
[22] tasmaa na hi.mse paramattakaamo''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0134^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando ^a^P0.0048^ea^ saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa {pa.tisallaa.naa (sii0)} vu.t.thito yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava appaayukaa hi, bhante, bhagavato maataa ahosi, sattaahajaate bhagavati bhagavato maataa kaalamakaasi, tusita.m kaaya.m upapajjii''ti.

[03] ``evameta.m, aananda {evameta.m aananda evameta.m aananda (syaa0)}, appaayukaa hi, aananda, bodhisattamaataro honti. sattaahajaatesu bodhisattesu bodhisattamaataro kaala.m karonti, tusita.m kaaya.m upapajjantii''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``ye keci bhuutaa bhavissanti ye vaapi,
[27] sabbe gamissanti pahaaya deha.m.
[26] ta.m sabbajaani.m kusalo viditvaa,
[22] aataapiyo brahmacariya.m careyyaa''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane ^a^T0.0146^ea^ kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena raajagahe suppabuddho naama ku.t.thii ahosi -- manussadaliddo, manussakapa.no ^a^V0.0124^ea^, manussavaraako. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuto dhamma.m desento nisinno hoti.

[03] addasaa kho suppabuddho ku.t.thii ta.m mahaajanakaaya.m duuratova sannipatita.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``nissa.msaya.m kho ettha ki~nci khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa bhaajiiyati {bhaajiiyissati (sii0)}. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena so mahaajanakaayo tenupasa"nkameyya.m. appeva naamettha ki~nci khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa labheyya''nti.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0135^ea^ kho suppabuddho ku.t.thii yena so mahaajanakaayo tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho suppabuddho ku.t.thii bhagavanta.m mahatiyaa parisaaya parivuta.m dhamma.m desenta.m nisinna.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``na kho ettha ki~nci khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa bhaajiiyati. sama.no aya.m gotamo parisati dhamma.m deseti. ya.mnuunaahampi dhamma.m su.neyya''nti. tattheva ekamanta.m nisiidi -- ``ahampi dhamma.m sossaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa sabbaavanta.m ^a^P0.0049^ea^ parisa.m cetasaa ceto paricca manasaakaasi ``ko nu kho idha bhabbo dhamma.m vi~n~naatu''nti? addasaa kho bhagavaa suppabuddha.m ku.t.thi.m tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinna.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho idha bhabbo dhamma.m vi~n~naatu''nti. suppabuddha.m ku.t.thi.m aarabbha aanupubbi.m katha.m {aanupubbikatha.m (sii0), anupubbikatha.m (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m; kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa"nkilesa.m; nekkhamme {nekkhamme ca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi suppabuddha.m ku.t.thi.m ^a^T0.0147^ea^ kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m, samudaya.m, nirodha.m, magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva suppabuddhassa ku.t.thissa tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.

[03] atha kho suppabuddho ku.t.thii di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthu saasane u.t.thaayaasanaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho suppabuddho ku.t.thii bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``abhikkanta.m ^a^V0.0125^ea^, bhante, abhikkata.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0136^ea^ kho suppabuddho ku.t.thii bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m ^a^T0.0148^ea^ katvaa pakkaami. atha kho acirapakkanta.m suppabuddha.m ku.t.thi.m gaavii taru.navacchaa adhipatitvaa jiivitaa voropesi.

[03] atha kho sambahulaa ^a^P0.0050^ea^ bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, bhante, suppabuddho naama ku.t.thii bhagavataa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito, so kaala"nkato. tassa kaa gati, ko abhisamparaayo''ti?

[03] ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, suppabuddho ku.t.thii; paccapaadi dhammassaanudhamma.m; na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m vihesesi. suppabuddho, bhikkhave, ku.t.thii ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena suppabuddho ku.t.thii ahosi -- manussadaliddo, manussakapa.no, manussavaraako''ti?

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, suppabuddho ku.t.thii imasmi.myeva raajagahe se.t.thiputto ahosi. so uyyaanabhuumi.m niyyanto addasa tagarasikhi.m {taggarasikhi.m (ka0)} paccekabuddha.m nagara.m pi.n.daaya pavisanta.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- `kvaaya.m ku.t.thii ku.t.thiciivarena vicaratii'ti? ni.t.thubhitvaa apasabyato {apabyaamato (syaa0 sa.m0 ni0 1.255)} karitvaa pakkaami. so tassa kammassa vipaakena bahuuni vassasataani bahuuni vassasahassaani bahuuni vassasatasahassaani niraye paccittha. tasseva kammassa vipaakaavasesena ^a^T0.0149^ea^ imasmi.myeva raajagahe ku.t.thii ahosi manussadaliddo, manussakapa.no, manussavaraako. so tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma saddha.m samaadiyi siila.m samaadiyi suta.m samaadiyi caaga.m samaadiyi pa~n~na.m samaadiyi. so ^a^V0.0126^ea^ tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma saddha.m samaadiyitvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa suta.m samaadiyitvaa caaga.m samaadiyitvaa pa~n~na.m samaadiyitvaa kaayassa ^a^M0.0137^ea^ bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanno devaana.m taavati.msaana.m sahabyata.m. so tattha a~n~ne deve atirocati va.n.nena ceva yasasaa caa''ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``cakkhumaa visamaaniiva, vijjamaane parakkame.
[22] pa.n.dito jiivalokasmi.m, paapaani parivajjaye''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P0.0051^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa kumaarakaa antaraa ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca jetavana.m macchake baadhenti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho bhagavaa te sambahule kumaarake antaraa ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca jetavana.m macchake baadhente. disvaana yena te kumaarakaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te kumaarake etadavoca -- ``bhaayatha vo, tumhe kumaarakaa, dukkhassa, appiya.m vo dukkha''nti? ``eva.m, bhante, bhaayaama maya.m, bhante, dukkhassa ^a^T0.0150^ea^, appiya.m no dukkha''nti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``sace bhaayatha dukkhassa, sace vo dukkhamappiya.m.
[22] maakattha paapaka.m kamma.m, aavi vaa yadi vaa raho..
[21] ``sace ca paapaka.m kamma.m, karissatha karotha vaa.
[22] na vo dukkhaa pamutyatthi, upeccapi {upaccapi (ka0), uppaccapi (?), uppatitvaapi iti attho} palaayata''nti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M0.0138^ea^ ^a^V0.0127^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto nisinno hoti.

[03] ``a.t.thime, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa, ye disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti. katame a.t.tha?

[03] ``mahaasamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro, na aayatakeneva papaato. yampi {ya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapo.no anupubbapabbhaaro na aayatakeneva papaato; aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0140^ea^ ^a^T0.0153^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naativattati; aya.m, bhikkhave {ayampi (sabbattha)}, mahaasamudde dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0129^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati. ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m ta.m khippameva {khippa~n~neva (sii0), khippa.myeva (ka0)} tiira.m vaaheti, thala.m ussaareti. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati, ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m ta.m khippameva tiira.m vaaheti thala.m ussaareti; aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa yamunaa aciravatii sarabhuu mahii, taa mahaasamudda.m patvaa {pattaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} jahanti purimaani naamagottaani; `mahaasamuddo'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti. yampi, bhikkhave, yaa kaaci mahaanadiyo, seyyathida.m -- ga"ngaa yamunaa aciravatii sarabhuu mahii taa mahaasamudda.m patvaa jahanti purimaani naamagottaani, `mahaasamuddo'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchanti; aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yaa ca loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m appenti, yaa ca antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasamuddassa ^a^T0.0154^ea^ uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati. yampi, bhikkhave ^a^P0.0054^ea^, yaa ca loke savantiyo mahaasamudda.m appenti, yaa ca antalikkhaa dhaaraa papatanti, na tena mahaasammuddassa uunatta.m vaa puuratta.m vaa pa~n~naayati; aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde pa~ncamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano. tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m ^a^M0.0141^ea^ rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohita"ngo masaaragalla.m. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaasamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimaani ratanaani, seyyathida.m -- muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohita"ngo {lohita"nko (sii0 pii0), lohitako (?)} masaaragalla.m; aya.m, bhikkhave, mahaasamudde sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, ya.m disvaa disvaa asuraa mahaasamudde abhiramanti.

[03] ``idha mayha.m, bhante, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `yathaa yathaa kho ayyo mahaakaccaano dhamma.m deseti nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m ^a^T0.0163^ea^ brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. pabbaajetu ma.m, bhante, ayyo mahaakaccaano''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitaa kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me upaasikaa na saavikaa bhavissanti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa ^a^T0.0175^ea^ dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhissanti desessanti pa~n~napessanti pa.t.thapessanti vivarissanti vibhajissanti uttaaniikarissanti uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desessantii'ti. etarahi kho pana, bhante, upaasikaa bhagavato saavikaa viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa saamiicippa.tipannaa anudhammacaariniyo saka.m aacariyaka.m uggahetvaa aacikkhanti desenti pa~n~napenti pa.t.thapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttaaniikaronti uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammena suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desenti. parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa; parinibbaatu sugato; parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato.

[03] ``bhaasitaa ^a^M0.0155^ea^ kho panesaa, bhante, bhagavataa vaacaa -- `na taavaaha.m, paapima, parinibbaayissaami yaava me ida.m brahmacariya.m na iddha~nceva bhavissati phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita'nti. etarahi kho pana, bhante {tayida.m bhante (sa.m0 ni0 5.822)}, bhagavato brahmacariya.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. parinibbaatu daani, bhante, bhagavaa; parinibbaatu sugato; parinibbaanakaalo daani, bhante, bhagavato''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, bhagavaa maara.m paapimanta.m etadavoca -- ``appossukko ^a^T0.0176^ea^ tva.m, paapima, hohi. na cira.m tathaagatassa parinibbaana.m bhavissati. ito ti.n.na.m maasaana.m accayena tathaagato parinibbaayissatii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa caapaale cetiye sato sampajaano aayusa"nkhaara.m ossajji. ossa.t.the ca bhagavataa aayusa"nkhaare mahaabhuumicaalo ahosi bhi.msanako lomaha.mso, devadundubhiyo {devadudrabhiyo (ka0)} ca phali.msu.
[03] atha ^a^V0.0143^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``tulamatula~nca sambhava.m,
[27] bhavasa"nkhaaramavassaji muni.
[26] ajjhattarato samaahito,
[22] abhindi kavacamivattasambhava''nti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena ^a^P0.0065^ea^ bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito bahidvaarako.t.thake nisinno hoti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] tena ^a^M0.0156^ea^ kho pana samayena satta ca ja.tilaa, satta ca niga.n.thaa, satta ca acelakaa, satta ca ekasaa.takaa, satta ca paribbaajakaa, paruu.lhakacchanakhalomaa khaarivividhamaadaaya {khaariividhamaadaaya (ka0 sa.m0 ni0 1.122; dii0 ni0 1.280)} bhagavato aviduure atikkamanti.

[03] addasaa kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo te satta ca ja.tile, satta ca niga.n.the, satta ca acelake, satta ca ekasaa.take, satta ca paribbaajake ^a^T0.0177^ea^, paruu.lhakacchanakhalome khaarivividhamaadaaya bhagavato aviduure atikkamante. disvaana u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.najaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m {pa.thaviya.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} nihantvaa yena te satta ca ja.tilaa, satta ca niga.n.thaa, satta ca acelakaa, satta ca ekasaa.takaa, satta ca paribbaajakaa, tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa tikkhattu.m naama.m saavesi -- ``raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo; raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo; raajaaha.m, bhante, pasenadi kosalo''ti.

[03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo acirapakkantesu tesu sattasu ca ja.tilesu, sattasu ca niga.n.thesu, sattasu ca acelakesu, sattasu ca ekasaa.takesu, sattasu ca paribbaajakesu, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno ^a^V0.0144^ea^ kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ye kho {ye ca kho (sii0), ye ca te (syaa0), ye nu keci kho (pii0), ye te (sa.m0 ni0 1.122), ye nu kho keci (?)} bhante, loke arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa ete tesa.m a~n~natare''ti {a~n~nataraati (sii0 ka0), a~n~nataroti (syaa0 pii0)}.

[03] ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tayaa gihinaa kaamabhoginaa puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasantena kaasikacandana.m paccanubhontena maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayantena jaataruuparajata.m saadiyantena -- ime vaa arahanto, ime vaa arahattamagga.m samaapannaati.

[03] ``sa.mvaasena kho, mahaaraaja, siila.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa na ittara.m {na ittarena (syaa0 sii0 syaa0 a.t.tha0)}, manasikarotaa no amanasikarotaa, pa~n~navataa no duppa~n~nena. sa.mvohaarena kho, mahaaraaja, soceyya.m veditabba.m. ta~nca kho diighena addhunaa ^a^M0.0157^ea^ ^a^T0.0178^ea^ na ittara.m, manasikarotaa no amanasikarotaa, pa~n~navataa no duppa~n~nena. aapadaasu kho, mahaaraaja, thaamo veditabbo. so ca kho diighena addhunaa na ittara.m, manasikarotaa no amanasikarotaa, pa~n~navataa no duppa~n~nena. saakacchaaya kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa veditabbaa. saa ca kho diighena addhunaa na ittara.m, manasikarotaa no amanasikarotaa, pa~n~navataa no duppa~n~nenaa''ti ^a^P0.0066^ea^.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m {subhaasitamida.m (sa.m0 ni0 1.122)}, bhante, bhagavataa -- `dujjaana.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tayaa gihinaa puttasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasantena kaasikacandana.m paccanubhontena maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayantena jaataruuparajata.m saadiyantena -- ime vaa arahanto, ime vaa arahattamagga.m samaapannaati. sa.mvaasena kho, mahaaraaja, siila.m veditabba.m...pe0... saakacchaaya kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa veditabbaa. saa ca kho diighena addhunaa na ittara.m, manasikarotaa no ^a^T0.0179^ea^ amanasikarotaa, pa~n~navataa no duppa~n~nenaa'''ti.

[03] ``ete, bhante, mama purisaa coraa {caraa (sa.m0 ni0 1.122)} ocarakaa janapada.m ocaritvaa gacchanti. tehi pa.thama.m oci.n.na.m aha.m pacchaa osaarissaami {otarissaami (sii0 syaa0 pii0), oyaayissaami (sii0 syaa0 a.t.tha0), osaapayissaami (sa.m0 ni0 1.122)}. idaani te, bhante, ta.m rajojalla.m pavaahetvaa sunhaataa suvilittaa kappitakesamassuu odaatavatthavasanaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngibhuutaa paricaaressantii'' {caariyanti (syaa0)} ti.
[03] atha kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``na ^a^V0.0145^ea^ vaayameyya sabbattha, naa~n~nassa puriso siyaa.
[22] naa~n~na.m nissaaya jiiveyya, dhammena na va.ni.m {vaa.ni.m (sii0), va.nii (syaa0 pii0), vaa.nija.m (ka0)} care''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa attano aneke ^a^M0.0158^ea^ paapake akusale dhamme pahiine paccavekkhamaano nisinno hoti, aneke ca kusale dhamme bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gate.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa {etamattha.m viditvaa (sii0 ka0)} attano aneke paapake akusale dhamme pahiine viditvaa aneke ca kusale dhamme bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gate {etamattha.m viditvaa (sii0 ka0)} taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --
[21] ``ahu pubbe tadaa naahu, naahu pubbe tadaa ahu.
[22] na caahu na ca bhavissati, na cetarahi vijjatii''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa ^a^T0.0180^ea^ naanaatitthiyasama.nabraahma.naparibbaajakaa ^a^P0.0067^ea^ saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti naanaadi.t.thikaa naanaakhantikaa naanaarucikaa naanaadi.t.thinissayanissitaa.

[03] santeke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santi paneke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santeke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``antavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santi paneke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``anantavaa loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santeke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santi paneke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santeke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa ^a^V0.0146^ea^, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santi paneke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santeke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti. santi paneke ^a^M0.0159^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na''nti.
[03] te bha.n.danajaataa ^a^T0.0181^ea^ kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti -- ``ediso dhammo, nediso dhammo; nediso dhammo, ediso dhammo''ti.

[03] atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.msu. saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkantaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m --
[03] ``idha, bhante, sambahulaa naanaatitthiyasama.nabraahma.naparibbaajakaa saavatthiya.m pa.tivasanti naanaadi.t.thikaa naanaakhantikaa naanaarucikaa naanaadi.t.thinissayanissitaa.

[03] ``santeke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti...pe0... ^a^T0.0182^ea^ te bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti -- `ediso dhammo, nediso dhammo; nediso dhammo, ediso dhammo''' ti.

[03] ``a~n~natitthiyaa, bhikkhave, paribbaajakaa andhaa acakkhukaa; attha.m na jaananti, anattha.m na jaananti, dhamma.m na jaananti, adhamma.m ^a^P0.0068^ea^ na jaananti. te attha.m ajaanantaa anattha.m ajaanantaa dhamma.m ajaanantaa adhamma.m ajaanantaa bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti -- `ediso dhammo, nediso dhammo; nediso dhammo, ediso dhammo'''ti.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, imissaayeva saavatthiyaa a~n~nataro raajaa ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, so raajaa a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- `ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yaavatakaa saavatthiyaa jaccandhaa te sabbe ekajjha.m sannipaatehii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso ^a^V0.0147^ea^ tassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa yaavatakaa saavatthiyaa jaccandhaa te ^a^T0.0183^ea^ sabbe gahetvaa yena so raajaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- `sannipaatitaa kho te, deva, yaavatakaa saavatthiyaa jaccandhaa'ti ^a^M0.0160^ea^. `tena hi, bha.ne, jaccandhaana.m hatthi.m dassehii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso tassa ra~n~no pa.tissutvaa jaccandhaana.m hatthi.m dassesi.

[03] ``ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa siisa.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa ka.n.na.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa danta.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa so.n.da.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa kaaya.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa paada.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa satthi.m {pi.t.thi.m (syaa0)} dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa na"ngu.t.tha.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti. ekaccaana.m jaccandhaana.m hatthissa vaaladhi.m dassesi -- `ediso, jaccandhaa, hatthii'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, so puriso jaccandhaana.m hatthi.m dassetvaa yena so raajaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m raajaana.m etadavoca -- `di.t.tho kho tehi, deva, jaccandhehi hatthii; yassa daani kaala.m ma~n~nasii'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, so raajaa yena te jaccandhaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te jaccandhe etadavoca -- `di.t.tho vo, jaccandhaa, hatthii'ti ^a^T0.0184^ea^? `eva.m, deva, di.t.tho no hatthii'ti. `vadetha, jaccandhaa, kiidiso hatthii'ti?
[03] ``yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa siisa.m di.t.tha.m ahosi, te evamaaha.msu -- `ediso, deva, hatthii seyyathaapi kumbho'ti.
[03] ``yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa ka.n.no di.t.tho ahosi, te evamaaha.msu -- `ediso, deva, hatthii seyyathaapi suppo'ti.
[03] ``yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa danto di.t.tho ahosi, te evamaaha.msu ^a^P0.0069^ea^ -- `ediso, deva, hatthii seyyathaapi khiilo'ti.
[03] ``yehi ^a^V0.0148^ea^, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa so.n.do di.t.tho ahosi, te evamaaha.msu -- `ediso, deva, hatthii seyyathaapi na"ngaliisaa'ti.
[03] ``yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa kaayo di.t.tho ahosi, te evamaaha.msu -- `ediso, deva, hatthii seyyathaapi ko.t.tho'ti.
[03] ``yehi ^a^M0.0161^ea^, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa paado di.t.tho ahosi, te evamaaha.msu -- `ediso, deva, hatthii seyyathaapi thuu.no'ti.

[03] ``yehi, bhikkhave, jaccandhehi hatthissa satthi di.t.tho {pi.t.thi di.t.taa (ka0 sii0 syaa0 pii0), satthi di.t.thaa (ka0 sii0)} hosi, te evamaaha.msu -- `ediso, deva, hatthii seyyathaapi udukkhalo'ti.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V0.0166^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa mallesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena paavaa tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa paavaaya.m viharati cundassa kammaaraputtassa ambavane.

[03] atha kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho cundo kammaaraputto tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa pahuuta~nca suukaramaddava.m bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] atha ^a^P0.0082^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena cundassa kammaaraputtassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa cunda.m kammaaraputta.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m te, cunda, suukaramaddava.m pa.tiyatta.m tena ma.m parivisa, ya.m pana~n~na.m khaadaniiya.m ^a^M0.0180^ea^ bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m tena bhikkhusa"ngha.m parivisaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ya.m ahosi suukaramaddava.m pa.tiyatta.m tena bhagavanta.m parivisi; ya.m pana~n~na.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyatta.m tena bhikkhusa"ngha.m parivisi.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa cunda.m kammaaraputta.m aamantesi -- ``ya.m te, cunda, suukaramaddava.m avasi.t.tha.m ta.m sobbhe nikha.naahi. naaha.m ta.m, cunda, passaami sadevake loke samaarake ^a^T0.0210^ea^ sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya yassa ta.m paribhutta.m sammaa pari.naama.m gaccheyya a~n~natra ^a^V0.0167^ea^ tathaagatassaa''ti {a~n~natra tathaagatenaati (ka0 sii0)}. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo kammaaraputto bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ya.m ahosi suukaramaddava.m avasi.t.tha.m ta.m sobbhe nikha.nitvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho cunda.m kammaaraputta.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho bhagavato cundassa kammaaraputtassa bhatta.m bhuttaavissa kharo aabaadho uppajji. lohitapakkhandikaa pabaa.lhaa {baa.lhaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vedanaa vattanti maara.nantikaa. tatra suda.m bhagavaa sato sampajaano adhivaasesi aviha~n~namaano. atha kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``aayaamaananda, yena kusinaaraa tenupasa"nkamissaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi.
[21] ``cundassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa, kammaarassaati me suta.m.
[22] aabaadha.m samphusii dhiiro, pabaa.lha.m maara.nantika.m..
[21] ``bhuttassa ca suukaramaddavena, byaadhippabaa.lho udapaadi satthuno.
[22] viriccamaano {viri~ncamaano (?) virecamaano (dii0 ni0 2.190)} bhagavaa avoca, `gacchaamaha.m kusinaara.m nagara'''nti..

[03] atha ^a^P0.0083^ea^ ^a^T0.0211^ea^ kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma yena a~n~natara.m rukkhamuula.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, aananda, catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~naapehi; kilantosmi, aananda, nisiidissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m ^a^M0.0181^ea^ pa~n~naapesi. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nisajja kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, aananda, paaniiya.m aahara; pipaasitosmi, aananda, pivissaamii''ti.

[03] dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi ^a^T0.0212^ea^ -- ``i"ngha me ^a^V0.0168^ea^ tva.m, aananda, paaniiya.m aahara; pipaasitosmi, aananda, pivissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato pa.tissutvaa patta.m gahetvaa yena saa nadii tenupasa"nkami. atha kho saa nadii cakkacchinnaa parittaa lu.litaa aavilaa sandamaanaa aayasmante aanande upasa"nkamante acchaa vippasannaa anaavilaa sandati.

[03] atha kho aayasmato aanandassa etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa! aya~nhi saa nadii cakkacchinnaa parittaa lu.litaa aavilaa sandamaanaa mayi upasa"nkamante acchaa vippasannaa anaavilaa sandatii''ti!! pattena paaniiya.m aadaaya yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante, tathaagatassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa! aya~nhi saa, bhante, nadii cakkacchinnaa parittaa lu.litaa aavilaa sandamaanaa mayi upasa"nkamante acchaa vippasannaa anaavilaa sandati!! pivatu bhagavaa paaniiya.m ^a^P0.0084^ea^, pivatu sugato paaniiya''nti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa paaniiya.m apaayi {apaasi (sii0)}. atha kho bhagavaa mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena kuku.t.thaa nadii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa kuku.t.tha.m nadi.m ajjhogaahetvaa nhatvaa ca pivitvaa ca paccuttaritvaa yena ambavana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m cundaka.m aamantesi -- ``i"ngha me tva.m, cundaka, catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~naapehi; kilantosmi, cundaka, nipajjissaamii''ti ^a^M0.0182^ea^ ^a^T0.0213^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa cundako bhagavato pa.tissutvaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~naapesi. atha kho bhagavaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. aayasmaa pana cundako tattheva bhagavato purato nisiidi.
[21] ``gantvaana buddho nadika.m kuku.t.tha.m,
[27] acchodaka.m saatudaka.m {saatodaka.m (sabbattha)} vippasanna.m.

[22] tathaagato appa.timodha loke..
[21] ``nhatvaa ca pivitvaa cudataari {nhatvaa ca uttari (ka0)} satthaa,
[27] purakkhato bhikkhuga.nassa majjhe.
[26] satthaa ^a^V0.0169^ea^ pavattaa bhagavaa idha dhamme,

[03] ```tassa te, aavuso cunda, laabhaa, tassa te suladdha.m yassa te tathaagato pacchima.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa parinibbuto. sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso cunda, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- dveme pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa ^a^M0.0183^ea^ samasamavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa ca. katame dve? ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati. ime dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samasamavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa ca.

[03] ```aayusa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, va.n.nasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, sukhasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, saggasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, yasasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita.m, aadhipateyyasa.mvattanika.m aayasmataa cundena kammaaraputtena kamma.m upacita'nti. cundassaananda, kammaaraputtassa eva.m vippa.tisaaro ^a^T0.0215^ea^ pa.tivinodetabbo''ti.
[03] atha ^a^V0.0170^ea^ kho bhagavaa etamattha.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m udaana.m udaanesi --

[27] sa.myamato vera.m na ciiyati.
[26] kusalo ca jahaati paapaka.m,
[22] raagadosamohakkhayaa sanibbuto''ti {parinibbutoti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena paa.taligaamo tadavasari. assosu.m kho paa.taligaamiyaa {paa.taligaamikaa (dii0 ni0 2.148)} upaasakaa -- ``bhagavaa kira magadhesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m paa.taligaama.m anuppatto''ti. atha kho paa.taligaamiyaa upaasakaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho paa.taligaamiyaa upaasakaa bhagavanta.m ^a^P0.0086^ea^ etadavocu.m -- ``adhivaasetu no, bhante, bhagavaa aavasathaagaara''nti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0184^ea^ kho paa.taligaamiyaa upaasakaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yenaavasathaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sabbasanthari.m aavasathaagaara.m santharitvaa aasanaani pa~n~naapetvaa udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapetvaa telappadiipa.m aaropetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho paa.taligaamiyaa upaasakaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sabbasantharisanthata.m {sabbasanthari.m santhata.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, bhante, aavasathaagaara.m; aasanaani ^a^T0.0216^ea^ pa~n~nattaani; udakama.niko pati.t.thaapito {udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapita.m (syaa0)} telappadiipo aaropito. yassadaani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena aavasathaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa paade pakkhaaletvaa aavasathaagaara.m pavisitvaa majjhima.m thambha.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi. bhikkhusa"nghopi kho paade pakkhaaletvaa aavasathaagaara.m pavisitvaa pacchima.m bhitti.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. paa.taligaamiyaapi kho upaasakaa paade pakkhaaletvaa aavasathaagaara.m pavisitvaa puratthima.m bhitti.m nissaaya pacchimaabhimukhaa ^a^V0.0171^ea^ nisiidi.msu bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. atha kho bhagavaa paa.taligaamiye upaasake aamantesi --

[03] ``pa~ncime, gahapatayo, aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. katame pa~nca? idha, gahapatayo, dussiilo siilavipanno pamaadaadhikara.na.m mahati.m bhogajaani.m nigacchati. aya.m pa.thamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.
[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, dussiilassa siilavipannassa paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati. aya.m dutiyo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, dussiilo siilavipanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m, yadi braahma.naparisa.m, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m -- avisaarado upasa"nkamati ma"nkubhuuto. aya.m tatiyo aadiinavo ^a^P0.0087^ea^ dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, siilavaa siilasampanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati -- yadi khattiyaparisa.m ^a^V0.0172^ea^, yadi braahma.naparisa.m, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m -- visaarado upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto. aya.m tatiyo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.
[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, siilavaa siilasampanno asammuu.lho kaala"nkaroti. aya.m catuttho aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapatayo, siilavaa siilasampanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. aya.m pa~ncamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. ime kho, gahapatayo, pa~nca aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaayaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^T0.0218^ea^ kho bhagavaa paa.taligaamiye upaasake bahudeva ratti.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samutejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa uyyojesi -- ``abhikkantaa kho, gahapatayo, ratti; yassadaani tumhe kaala.m ma~n~nathaa''ti. {``eva.m bhante``ti khopaa.taligaamiyaa upaasakaa bhagavato pa.tissutvaa (mahaava0 285; dii0 ni0 2.151)} atha kho paa.taligaamiyaa upaasakaa bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa {``eva.m bhante``ti khopaa.taligaamiyaa upaasakaa bhagavato pa.tissutvaa (mahaava0 285; dii0 ni0 2.151)} u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu. atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantesu paa.taligaamiyesu upaasakesu su~n~naagaara.m paavisi.

[03] tena ^a^M0.0186^ea^ kho pana samayena sunidhavassakaaraa {suniidhavassakaaraa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} magadhamahaamattaa paa.taligaame nagara.m maapenti ^a^P0.0088^ea^ vajjiina.m pa.tibaahaaya. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa devataayo sahassasahasseva {sahasseva (syaa0 ka0), sahassasseva (pii0)} paa.taligaame vatthuuni parigga.nhanti. yasmi.m padese mahesakkhaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti mahesakkhaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese majjhimaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti majjhimaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese niicaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti niicaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m.

[03] addasaa kho bhagavaa dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena taa devataayo sahassasahasseva paa.taligaame vatthuuni parigga.nhantiyo. yasmi.m padese mahesakkhaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, mahesakkhaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti ^a^T0.0219^ea^ nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese majjhimaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, majjhimaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese niicaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti, niicaana.m ^a^V0.0173^ea^ tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa paccuusasamaye paccu.t.thaaya aayasmanta.m aananda.m aamantesi --

[03] ``ke nu kho {ko nu kho (sabbattha)} aananda paa.taligaame nagara.m maapentii''ti {maapetiiti (sabbattha)}. ``sunidhavassakaaraa, bhante, magadhamahaamattaa paa.taligaame nagara.m maapenti vajjiina.m pa.tibaahaayaa''ti. ``seyyathaapi, aananda, devehi taavati.msehi saddhi.m mantetvaa; evameva kho, aananda, sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa paa.taligaame nagara.m maapenti vajjiina.m pa.tibaahaaya. idhaaha.m, aananda, addasa.m dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena sambahulaa devataayo sahassasahasseva paa.taligaame vatthuuni parigga.nhantiyo. yasmi.m padese mahesakkhaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti mahesakkhaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m padese majjhimaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti majjhimaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yasmi.m ^a^M0.0187^ea^ padese niicaa devataa vatthuuni parigga.nhanti niicaana.m tattha ra~n~na.m raajamahaamattaana.m cittaani namanti nivesanaani maapetu.m. yaavataa, aananda, ariya.m aayatana.m yaavataa va.nippatho ida.m agganagara.m ^a^T0.0220^ea^ bhavissati paa.taliputta.m pu.tabhedana.m. paa.taliputtassa kho, aananda, tayo antaraayaa bhavissanti -- aggito vaa udakato vaa mithubhedato vaa''ti.

[03] atha kho sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saaraa.niya.m {saaraa.niiya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho sunidhavassakaaraa ^a^P0.0089^ea^ magadhamahaamattaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``adhivaasetu no bhava.m gotamo ajjatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho sunidhavassakaaraa magadhamahaamattaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa yena sako aavasatho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sake aavasathe pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocesu.m -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.
